            Clear status
          </button>
        </div>
</form>    </details-dialog>
  </details>
</div>

    </div>
    <div class="dropdown-divider"></div>

        <td id="L462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="462"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="463"></td>
        <td id="LC463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of mine. Huck Finn is drawn from life; Tom Sawyer also, but not from an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="464"></td>
        <td id="LC464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">individual--he is a combination of the characteristics of three boys whom</td>

        <td id="L465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="465"></td>
        <td id="LC465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I knew, and therefore belongs to the composite order of architecture.</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="467"></td>

        <td id="L469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="469"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="471"></td>
        <td id="LC471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Although my book is intended mainly for the entertainment of boys and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="472"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="473"></td>

        <td id="LC547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hang the boy, can&#39;t I never learn anything? Ain&#39;t he played me tricks</td>

        <td id="LC558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead sister&#39;s boy, poor thing, and I ain&#39;t got the heart to lash him,</td>

        <td id="L560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="560"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="561"></td>
        <td id="LC561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">born of woman is of few days and full of trouble, as the Scripture</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="562"></td>
        <td id="LC562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says, and I reckon it&#39;s so. He&#39;ll play hookey this evening, * and [*</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="563"></td>
        <td id="LC563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Southwestern for “afternoon”] I&#39;ll just be obleeged to make him work,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="564"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="565"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="566"></td>
        <td id="LC566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hates anything else, and I&#39;ve _got_ to do some of my duty by him, or</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I&#39;ll be the ruination of the child.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="568"></td>
        <td id="LC568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="569"></td>
        <td id="LC569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom did play hookey, and he had a very good time. He got back home</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="570"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="666"></td>
        <td id="LC666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The summer evenings were long. It was not dark, yet. Presently Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="667"></td>
        <td id="LC667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">checked his whistle. A stranger was before him--a boy a shade larger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="668"></td>
        <td id="LC668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than himself. A new-comer of any age or either sex was an im-pressive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="669"></td>
        <td id="LC669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curiosity in the poor little shabby village of St. Petersburg. This boy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="670"></td>
        <td id="LC670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was well dressed, too--well dressed on a week-day. This was simply as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="671"></td>
        <td id="LC671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astounding. His cap was a dainty thing, his close-buttoned blue cloth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="672"></td>
        <td id="LC672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roundabout was new and natty, and so were his pantaloons. He had shoes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="673"></td>
        <td id="LC673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on--and it was only Friday. He even wore a necktie, a bright bit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="674"></td>
        <td id="LC674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ribbon. He had a citified air about him that ate into Tom&#39;s vitals. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="675"></td>
        <td id="LC675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more Tom stared at the splendid marvel, the higher he turned up his nose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="676"></td>
        <td id="LC676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at his finery and the shabbier and shabbier his own outfit seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="677"></td>
        <td id="LC677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him to grow. Neither boy spoke. If one moved, the other moved--but only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="678"></td>
        <td id="LC678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sidewise, in a circle; they kept face to face and eye to eye all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="679"></td>
        <td id="LC679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. Finally Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="680"></td>
        <td id="LC680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="681"></td>
        <td id="LC681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I can lick you!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="682"></td>
        <td id="LC682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="683"></td>
        <td id="LC683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;d like to see you try it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="684"></td>
        <td id="LC684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="685"></td>

        <td id="L701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="701"></td>
        <td id="LC701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">An uncomfortable pause. Then Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="755"></td>
        <td id="LC755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Another pause, and more eying and sidling around each other. Presently</td>

        <td id="L756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="756"></td>

        <td id="L761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="761"></td>
        <td id="LC761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="762"></td>
        <td id="LC762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I won&#39;t.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="763"></td>
        <td id="LC763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>
        <td id="LC764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I won&#39;t either.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="765"></td>
        <td id="LC765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="766"></td>
        <td id="LC766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So they stood, each with a foot placed at an angle as a brace, and both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="767"></td>
        <td id="LC767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoving with might and main, and glowering at each other with hate. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="768"></td>
        <td id="LC768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither could get an advantage. After struggling till both were hot and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="769"></td>
        <td id="LC769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flushed, each relaxed his strain with watchful caution, and Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="770"></td>
        <td id="LC770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="771"></td>
        <td id="LC771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You&#39;re a coward and a pup. I&#39;ll tell my big brother on you, and he can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="772"></td>
        <td id="LC772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thrash you with his little finger, and I&#39;ll make him do it, too.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="773"></td>
        <td id="LC773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="774"></td>
        <td id="LC774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What do I care for your big brother? I&#39;ve got a brother that&#39;s bigger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="775"></td>
        <td id="LC775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than he is--and what&#39;s more, he can throw him over that fence, too.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="776"></td>
        <td id="LC776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> [Both brothers were imaginary.]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="777"></td>
        <td id="LC777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="778"></td>
        <td id="LC778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s a lie.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="779"></td>
        <td id="LC779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="780"></td>
        <td id="LC780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_Your_ saying so don&#39;t make it so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="781"></td>
        <td id="LC781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="782"></td>
        <td id="LC782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom drew a line in the dust with his big toe, and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="783"></td>
        <td id="LC783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="784"></td>
        <td id="LC784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I dare you to step over that, and I&#39;ll lick you till you can&#39;t stand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="785"></td>
        <td id="LC785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up. Anybody that&#39;ll take a dare will steal sheep.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="786"></td>
        <td id="LC786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="787"></td>
        <td id="LC787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The new boy stepped over promptly, and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="788"></td>
        <td id="LC788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="789"></td>
        <td id="LC789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now you said you&#39;d do it, now let&#39;s see you do it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="790"></td>
        <td id="LC790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="791"></td>
        <td id="LC791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don&#39;t you crowd me now; you better look out.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="792"></td>
        <td id="LC792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="793"></td>
        <td id="LC793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, you _said_ you&#39;d do it--why don&#39;t you do it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="794"></td>
        <td id="LC794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="795"></td>
        <td id="LC795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“By jingo! for two cents I _will_ do it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="796"></td>
        <td id="LC796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="797"></td>
        <td id="LC797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The new boy took two broad coppers out of his pocket and held them out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="798"></td>
        <td id="LC798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with derision. Tom struck them to the ground. In an instant both boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="799"></td>
        <td id="LC799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were rolling and tumbling in the dirt, gripped together like cats; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="800"></td>
        <td id="LC800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the space of a minute they tugged and tore at each other&#39;s hair and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="801"></td>
        <td id="LC801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothes, punched and scratched each other&#39;s nose, and covered themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="802"></td>
        <td id="LC802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with dust and glory. Presently the confusion took form, and through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="803"></td>
        <td id="LC803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fog of battle Tom appeared, seated astride the new boy, and pounding him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="804"></td>
        <td id="LC804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his fists. “Holler &#39;nuff!” said he.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="805"></td>
        <td id="LC805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="806"></td>
        <td id="LC806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boy only struggled to free himself. He was crying--mainly from rage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="807"></td>
        <td id="LC807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="808"></td>
        <td id="LC808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Holler &#39;nuff!”--and the pounding went on.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="809"></td>
        <td id="LC809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="810"></td>
        <td id="LC810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last the stranger got out a smothered “&#39;Nuff!” and Tom let him up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="811"></td>
        <td id="LC811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="812"></td>
        <td id="LC812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="813"></td>
        <td id="LC813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now that&#39;ll learn you. Better look out who you&#39;re fooling with next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="814"></td>
        <td id="LC814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="815"></td>
        <td id="LC815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="816"></td>
        <td id="LC816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The new boy went off brushing the dust from his clothes, sobbing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="817"></td>
        <td id="LC817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snuffling, and occasionally looking back and shaking his head and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="818"></td>
        <td id="LC818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threatening what he would do to Tom the “next time he caught him out.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="819"></td>
        <td id="LC819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> To which Tom responded with jeers, and started off in high feather, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="820"></td>
        <td id="LC820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as soon as his back was turned the new boy snatched up a stone, threw it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="821"></td>
        <td id="LC821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and hit him between the shoulders and then turned tail and ran like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="822"></td>
        <td id="LC822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an antelope. Tom chased the traitor home, and thus found out where he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="823"></td>
        <td id="LC823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lived. He then held a position at the gate for some time, daring the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="824"></td>
        <td id="LC824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy to come outside, but the enemy only made faces at him through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="825"></td>
        <td id="LC825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window and declined. At last the enemy&#39;s mother appeared, and called Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="826"></td>
        <td id="LC826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a bad, vicious, vulgar child, and ordered him away. So he went away; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="827"></td>
        <td id="LC827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he said he “&#39;lowed” to “lay” for that boy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="828"></td>
        <td id="LC828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="829"></td>
        <td id="LC829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He got home pretty late that night, and when he climbed cautiously in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="830"></td>
        <td id="LC830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the window, he uncovered an ambuscade, in the person of his aunt; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="831"></td>
        <td id="LC831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when she saw the state his clothes were in her resolution to turn his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="832"></td>
        <td id="LC832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Saturday holiday into captivity at hard labor became adamantine in its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="833"></td>
        <td id="LC833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">firmness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="834"></td>
        <td id="LC834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="835"></td>
        <td id="LC835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="836"></td>
        <td id="LC836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="837"></td>
        <td id="LC837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="838"></td>
        <td id="LC838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER II</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="839"></td>
        <td id="LC839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="840"></td>
        <td id="LC840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SATURDAY morning was come, and all the summer world was bright and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="841"></td>
        <td id="LC841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fresh, and brimming with life. There was a song in every heart; and if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="842"></td>
        <td id="LC842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the heart was young the music issued at the lips. There was cheer in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="843"></td>
        <td id="LC843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every face and a spring in every step. The locust-trees were in bloom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>
        <td id="LC844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the fragrance of the blossoms filled the air. Cardiff Hill, beyond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="845"></td>
        <td id="LC845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the village and above it, was green with vegetation and it lay just far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="846"></td>
        <td id="LC846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough away to seem a Delectable Land, dreamy, reposeful, and inviting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="847"></td>
        <td id="LC847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="848"></td>
        <td id="LC848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom appeared on the sidewalk with a bucket of whitewash and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="849"></td>
        <td id="LC849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long-handled brush. He surveyed the fence, and all gladness left him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="850"></td>
        <td id="LC850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a deep melancholy settled down upon his spirit. Thirty yards of board</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="851"></td>
        <td id="LC851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence nine feet high. Life to him seemed hollow, and existence but a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="852"></td>
        <td id="LC852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burden. Sighing, he dipped his brush and passed it along the topmost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="853"></td>
        <td id="LC853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plank; repeated the operation; did it again; compared the insignificant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="854"></td>
        <td id="LC854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whitewashed streak with the far-reaching continent of unwhitewashed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="855"></td>
        <td id="LC855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence, and sat down on a tree-box discouraged. Jim came skipping out at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="856"></td>
        <td id="LC856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gate with a tin pail, and singing Buffalo Gals. Bringing water from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="857"></td>
        <td id="LC857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the town pump had always been hateful work in Tom&#39;s eyes, before, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="858"></td>
        <td id="LC858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now it did not strike him so. He remembered that there was company at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="859"></td>
        <td id="LC859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pump. White, mulatto, and negro boys and girls were always there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="860"></td>
        <td id="LC860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waiting their turns, resting, trading playthings, quarrelling, fighting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="861"></td>
        <td id="LC861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skylarking. And he remembered that although the pump was only a hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="862"></td>
        <td id="LC862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fifty yards off, Jim never got back with a bucket of water under an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="863"></td>
        <td id="LC863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour--and even then somebody generally had to go after him. Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="864"></td>
        <td id="LC864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="865"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="866"></td>
        <td id="LC866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="867"></td>
        <td id="LC867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim shook his head and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="868"></td>

        <td id="L869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="869"></td>

        <td id="L871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="871"></td>

        <td id="L900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="900"></td>

        <td id="L903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="903"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="904"></td>

        <td id="LC905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would make a world of fun of him for having to work--the very</td>

        <td id="L909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="909"></td>

        <td id="L910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="910"></td>

        <td id="L948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="948"></td>
        <td id="LC948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom went on whitewashing--paid no attention to the steamboat. Ben stared</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="950"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="951"></td>
        <td id="LC951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No answer. Tom surveyed his last touch with the eye of an artist, then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="952"></td>
        <td id="LC952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he gave his brush another gentle sweep and surveyed the result, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1139"></td>
        <td id="LC1139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discovered him; then he pretended he did not know she was present, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1140"></td>
        <td id="LC1140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to “show off” in all sorts of absurd boyish ways, in order to win</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1141"></td>
        <td id="LC1141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her admiration. He kept up this grotesque foolishness for some time;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1142"></td>
        <td id="LC1142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but by-and-by, while he was in the midst of some dangerous gymnastic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1143"></td>
        <td id="LC1143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">performances, he glanced aside and saw that the little girl was wending</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1144"></td>
        <td id="LC1144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her way toward the house. Tom came up to the fence and leaned on it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1145"></td>
        <td id="LC1145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grieving, and hoping she would tarry yet awhile longer. She halted a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1146"></td>
        <td id="LC1146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment on the steps and then moved toward the door. Tom heaved a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1147"></td>
        <td id="LC1147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sigh as she put her foot on the threshold. But his face lit up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1148"></td>
        <td id="LC1148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right away, for she tossed a pansy over the fence a moment before she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1149"></td>
        <td id="LC1149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappeared.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1150"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1151"></td>
        <td id="LC1151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boy ran around and stopped within a foot or two of the flower, and</td>

        <td id="L1152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1152"></td>

        <td id="L1153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1153"></td>
        <td id="LC1153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if he had discovered something of interest going on in that direction.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1154"></td>

        <td id="L1161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1161"></td>
        <td id="LC1161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anatomy, and not hypercritical, anyway.</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1163"></td>
        <td id="LC1163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He returned, now, and hung about the fence till nightfall, “showing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC1179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently she stepped into the kitchen, and Sid, happy in his immunity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1180"></td>
        <td id="LC1180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reached for the sugar-bowl--a sort of glorying over Tom which was</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1181"></td>
        <td id="LC1181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wellnigh unbearable. But Sid&#39;s fingers slipped and the bowl dropped and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1182"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1187"></td>
        <td id="LC1187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so brimful of exultation that he could hardly hold himself when the old</td>

        <td id="L1188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1188"></td>
        <td id="LC1188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady came back and stood above the wreck discharging lightnings of wrath</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L1192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1192"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC1195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Polly paused, perplexed, and Tom looked for healing pity. But when</td>

        <td id="L1197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1197"></td>

        <td id="L1198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1198"></td>

        <td id="L1200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1200"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1201"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1204"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1205"></td>
        <td id="LC1205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom sulked in a corner and exalted his woes. He knew that in her heart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1206"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1217"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1218"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1219"></td>
        <td id="LC1219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these dreams, that he had to keep swallowing, he was so like to choke;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1220"></td>
        <td id="LC1220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and his eyes swam in a blur of water, which overflowed when he winked,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1221"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1223"></td>
        <td id="LC1223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worldly cheeriness or any grating delight intrude upon it; it was too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1224"></td>
        <td id="LC1224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sacred for such contact; and so, presently, when his cousin Mary danced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1225"></td>
        <td id="LC1225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in, all alive with the joy of seeing home again after an age-long visit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1226"></td>
        <td id="LC1226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of one week to the country, he got up and moved in clouds and darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1227"></td>
        <td id="LC1227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out at one door as she brought song and sunshine in at the other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1228"></td>

        <td id="L1235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1235"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1312"></td>
        <td id="LC1312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1314"></td>
        <td id="LC1314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1315"></td>
        <td id="LC1315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“For they--a--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1316"></td>
        <td id="LC1316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1317"></td>
        <td id="LC1317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“S, H, A--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1318"></td>
        <td id="LC1318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1319"></td>
        <td id="LC1319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“For they S, H--Oh, I don&#39;t know what it is!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1320"></td>
        <td id="LC1320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1321"></td>
        <td id="LC1321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_Shall_!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1322"></td>
        <td id="LC1322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1323"></td>
        <td id="LC1323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, _shall_! for they shall--for they shall--a--a--shall mourn--a--a--blessed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1324"></td>
        <td id="LC1324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are they that shall--they that--a--they that shall mourn, for they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1325"></td>
        <td id="LC1325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall--a--shall _what_? Why don&#39;t you tell me, Mary?--what do you want to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1326"></td>
        <td id="LC1326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be so mean for?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1327"></td>
        <td id="LC1327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1328"></td>
        <td id="LC1328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, Tom, you poor thick-headed thing, I&#39;m not teasing you. I wouldn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1329"></td>
        <td id="LC1329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do that. You must go and learn it again. Don&#39;t you be discouraged, Tom,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1330"></td>
        <td id="LC1330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you&#39;ll manage it--and if you do, I&#39;ll give you something ever so nice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1331"></td>
        <td id="LC1331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There, now, that&#39;s a good boy.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1332"></td>
        <td id="LC1332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1333"></td>
        <td id="LC1333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All right! What is it, Mary, tell me what it is.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1334"></td>
        <td id="LC1334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1335"></td>
        <td id="LC1335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Never you mind, Tom. You know if I say it&#39;s nice, it is nice.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1336"></td>
        <td id="LC1336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1337"></td>
        <td id="LC1337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You bet you that&#39;s so, Mary. All right, I&#39;ll tackle it again.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1338"></td>
        <td id="LC1338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1339"></td>
        <td id="LC1339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And he did “tackle it again”--and under the double pressure of curiosity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1340"></td>
        <td id="LC1340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and prospective gain he did it with such spirit that he accomplished a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1341"></td>
        <td id="LC1341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shining success. Mary gave him a brand-new “Barlow” knife worth twelve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1342"></td>
        <td id="LC1342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a half cents; and the convulsion of delight that swept his system</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1343"></td>
        <td id="LC1343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shook him to his foundations. True, the knife would not cut anything,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1344"></td>
        <td id="LC1344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but it was a “sure-enough” Barlow, and there was inconceivable grandeur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1345"></td>
        <td id="LC1345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in that--though where the Western boys ever got the idea that such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1346"></td>
        <td id="LC1346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weapon could possibly be counterfeited to its injury is an imposing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1347"></td>
        <td id="LC1347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mystery and will always remain so, perhaps. Tom contrived to scarify the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1348"></td>
        <td id="LC1348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cupboard with it, and was arranging to begin on the bureau, when he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1349"></td>
        <td id="LC1349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called off to dress for Sunday-school.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1350"></td>
        <td id="LC1350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1351"></td>
        <td id="LC1351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mary gave him a tin basin of water and a piece of soap, and he went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1352"></td>
        <td id="LC1352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outside the door and set the basin on a little bench there; then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1353"></td>
        <td id="LC1353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dipped the soap in the water and laid it down; turned up his sleeves;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1354"></td>
        <td id="LC1354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poured out the water on the ground, gently, and then entered the kitchen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1355"></td>
        <td id="LC1355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and began to wipe his face diligently on the towel behind the door. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1356"></td>
        <td id="LC1356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mary removed the towel and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1357"></td>
        <td id="LC1357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1358"></td>
        <td id="LC1358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now ain&#39;t you ashamed, Tom. You mustn&#39;t be so bad. Water won&#39;t hurt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1359"></td>
        <td id="LC1359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1360"></td>
        <td id="LC1360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1361"></td>
        <td id="LC1361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom was a trifle disconcerted. The basin was refilled, and this time he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1362"></td>
        <td id="LC1362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood over it a little while, gathering resolution; took in a big breath</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1363"></td>
        <td id="LC1363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and began. When he entered the kitchen presently, with both eyes shut</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1364"></td>
        <td id="LC1364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and groping for the towel with his hands, an honorable testimony of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1365"></td>
        <td id="LC1365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suds and water was dripping from his face. But when he emerged from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1366"></td>
        <td id="LC1366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the towel, he was not yet satisfactory, for the clean territory stopped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1367"></td>
        <td id="LC1367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short at his chin and his jaws, like a mask; below and beyond this line</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1368"></td>
        <td id="LC1368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was a dark expanse of unirrigated soil that spread downward in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1369"></td>
        <td id="LC1369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">front and backward around his neck. Mary took him in hand, and when she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1370"></td>
        <td id="LC1370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was done with him he was a man and a brother, without distinction of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1371"></td>
        <td id="LC1371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">color, and his saturated hair was neatly brushed, and its short curls</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1372"></td>
        <td id="LC1372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrought into a dainty and symmetrical general effect. [He privately</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1373"></td>
        <td id="LC1373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoothed out the curls, with labor and difficulty, and plastered his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1374"></td>
        <td id="LC1374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hair close down to his head; for he held curls to be effeminate, and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1375"></td>
        <td id="LC1375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own filled his life with bitterness.] Then Mary got out a suit of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1376"></td>
        <td id="LC1376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothing that had been used only on Sundays during two years--they were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1377"></td>
        <td id="LC1377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simply called his “other clothes”--and so by that we know the size of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1378"></td>
        <td id="LC1378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wardrobe. The girl “put him to rights” after he had dressed himself;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she buttoned his neat roundabout up to his chin, turned his vast shirt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>
        <td id="LC1380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">collar down over his shoulders, brushed him off and crowned him with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>
        <td id="LC1381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his speckled straw hat. He now looked exceedingly improved and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1382"></td>
        <td id="LC1382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uncomfortable. He was fully as uncomfortable as he looked; for there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1383"></td>
        <td id="LC1383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a restraint about whole clothes and cleanliness that galled him. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1384"></td>
        <td id="LC1384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hoped that Mary would forget his shoes, but the hope was blighted; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1385"></td>
        <td id="LC1385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coated them thoroughly with tallow, as was the custom, and brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1386"></td>
        <td id="LC1386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them out. He lost his temper and said he was always being made to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1387"></td>
        <td id="LC1387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything he didn&#39;t want to do. But Mary said, persuasively:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1388"></td>
        <td id="LC1388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1389"></td>
        <td id="LC1389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Please, Tom--that&#39;s a good boy.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1390"></td>
        <td id="LC1390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1391"></td>
        <td id="LC1391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So he got into the shoes snarling. Mary was soon ready, and the three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1392"></td>
        <td id="LC1392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children set out for Sunday-school--a place that Tom hated with his whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1393"></td>
        <td id="LC1393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart; but Sid and Mary were fond of it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1394"></td>
        <td id="LC1394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1395"></td>
        <td id="LC1395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sabbath-school hours were from nine to half-past ten; and then church</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1396"></td>
        <td id="LC1396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">service. Two of the children always remained for the sermon voluntarily,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1397"></td>
        <td id="LC1397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the other always remained too--for stronger reasons. The church&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1398"></td>
        <td id="LC1398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high-backed, uncushioned pews would seat about three hundred persons;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>
        <td id="LC1399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the edifice was but a small, plain affair, with a sort of pine board</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1400"></td>
        <td id="LC1400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tree-box on top of it for a steeple. At the door Tom dropped back a step</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1401"></td>
        <td id="LC1401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and accosted a Sunday-dressed comrade:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1402"></td>
        <td id="LC1402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1403"></td>
        <td id="LC1403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Say, Billy, got a yaller ticket?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1404"></td>
        <td id="LC1404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1405"></td>
        <td id="LC1405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1406"></td>
        <td id="LC1406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1407"></td>
        <td id="LC1407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What&#39;ll you take for her?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1408"></td>
        <td id="LC1408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1409"></td>
        <td id="LC1409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What&#39;ll you give?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1410"></td>
        <td id="LC1410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1411"></td>
        <td id="LC1411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Piece of lickrish and a fish-hook.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1412"></td>
        <td id="LC1412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1413"></td>
        <td id="LC1413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Less see &#39;em.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L1594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1594"></td>

        <td id="L1673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1673"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1676"></td>
        <td id="LC1676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">choir in the gallery. The choir always tittered and whispered all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1677"></td>
        <td id="LC1677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through service. There was once a church choir that was not ill-bred,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1678"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1681"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1682"></td>
        <td id="LC1682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The minister gave out the hymn, and read it through with a relish, in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1683"></td>
        <td id="LC1683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peculiar style which was much admired in that part of the country. His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1684"></td>
        <td id="LC1684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice began on a medium key and climbed steadily up till it reached a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1685"></td>
        <td id="LC1685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain point, where it bore with strong emphasis upon the topmost word</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1776"></td>
        <td id="LC1776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">descended and touched the enemy, who seized it. There was a sharp yelp,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1777"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1779"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="L1819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1819"></td>
        <td id="LC1819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">MONDAY morning found Tom Sawyer miserable. Monday morning always found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1820"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1821"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1824"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1826"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1853"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1857"></td>
        <td id="LC1857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom went on groaning. Sid said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1858"></td>
        <td id="LC1858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom! Say, Tom!” [No response.] “Here, Tom! TOM! What is the matter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1860"></td>
        <td id="LC1860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom?” And he shook him and looked in his face anxiously.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1861"></td>
        <td id="LC1861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1862"></td>
        <td id="LC1862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom moaned out:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1863"></td>
        <td id="LC1863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, what&#39;s the matter, Tom? I must call auntie.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No--never mind. It&#39;ll be over by and by, maybe. Don&#39;t call anybody.”</td>

        <td id="L1947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1947"></td>

        <td id="L1948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1948"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1950"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>
        <td id="LC1951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way. He gathered quite a following of lads interested in the exhibition;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>

      </tr>
