        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he did not feel that it wasn&#39;t anything to spit like Tom Sawyer;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but another boy said, “Sour grapes!” and he wandered away a dismantled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hero.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shortly Tom came upon the juvenile pariah of the village, Huckleberry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Finn, son of the town drunkard. Huckleberry was cordially hated and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreaded by all the mothers of the town, because he was idle and lawless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and vulgar and bad--and because all their children admired him so, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delighted in his forbidden society, and wished they dared to be like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. Tom was like the rest of the respectable boys, in that he envied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huckleberry his gaudy outcast condition, and was under strict orders</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not to play with him. So he played with him every time he got a chance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huckleberry was always dressed in the cast-off clothes of full-grown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men, and they were in perennial bloom and fluttering with rags. His hat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a vast ruin with a wide crescent lopped out of its brim; his coat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he wore one, hung nearly to his heels and had the rearward buttons</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far down the back; but one suspender supported his trousers; the seat of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>
        <td id="LC1972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the trousers bagged low and contained nothing, the fringed legs dragged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the dirt when not rolled up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>
        <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huckleberry came and went, at his own free will. He slept on doorsteps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in fine weather and in empty hogsheads in wet; he did not have to go to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">school or to church, or call any being master or obey anybody; he could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1978"></td>
        <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go fishing or swimming when and where he chose, and stay as long as it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1979"></td>
        <td id="LC1979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suited him; nobody forbade him to fight; he could sit up as late as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1980"></td>
        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleased; he was always the first boy that went barefoot in the spring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>
        <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the last to resume leather in the fall; he never had to wash, nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put on clean clothes; he could swear wonderfully. In a word, everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that goes to make life precious that boy had. So thought every harassed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1984"></td>
        <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hampered, respectable boy in St. Petersburg.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>
        <td id="LC1985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1986"></td>
        <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom hailed the romantic outcast:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1987"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2025"></td>

        <td id="L2026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2026"></td>
        <td id="LC2026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, he told Jeff Thatcher, and Jeff told Johnny Baker, and Johnny</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2027"></td>
        <td id="LC2027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told Jim Hollis, and Jim told Ben Rogers, and Ben told a nigger, and the</td>

        <td id="L2028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2028"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2029"></td>

        <td id="LC2030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, what of it? They&#39;ll all lie. Leastways all but the nigger. I</td>

        <td id="L2031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2031"></td>
        <td id="LC2031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don&#39;t know _him_. But I never see a nigger that _wouldn&#39;t_ lie. Shucks!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2032"></td>
        <td id="LC2032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now you tell me how Bob Tanner done it, Huck.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2033"></td>

        <td id="L2034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2034"></td>
        <td id="LC2034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, he took and dipped his hand in a rotten stump where the rain-water</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2035"></td>
        <td id="LC2035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2048"></td>
        <td id="LC2048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2049"></td>
        <td id="LC2049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Aha! Talk about trying to cure warts with spunk-water such a blame fool</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2050"></td>
        <td id="LC2050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way as that! Why, that ain&#39;t a-going to do any good. You got to go all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2051"></td>
        <td id="LC2051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by yourself, to the middle of the woods, where you know there&#39;s a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2052"></td>
        <td id="LC2052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spunk-water stump, and just as it&#39;s midnight you back up against the stump</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2053"></td>
        <td id="LC2053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and jam your hand in and say:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2054"></td>
        <td id="LC2054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2055"></td>
        <td id="LC2055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Barley-corn, barley-corn, injun-meal shorts, Spunk-water, spunk-water,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2056"></td>
        <td id="LC2056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swaller these warts,&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2057"></td>
        <td id="LC2057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2058"></td>
        <td id="LC2058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then walk away quick, eleven steps, with your eyes shut, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2059"></td>
        <td id="LC2059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn around three times and walk home without speaking to anybody.</td>

        <td id="L2327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2327"></td>
        <td id="LC2327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2328"></td>
        <td id="LC2328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2329"></td>
        <td id="LC2329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE harder Tom tried to fasten his mind on his book, the more his ideas</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2330"></td>
        <td id="LC2330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wandered. So at last, with a sigh and a yawn, he gave it up. It seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2331"></td>
        <td id="LC2331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him that the noon recess would never come. The air was utterly dead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2332"></td>
        <td id="LC2332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was not a breath stirring. It was the sleepiest of sleepy days.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2333"></td>
        <td id="LC2333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The drowsing murmur of the five and twenty studying scholars soothed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2334"></td>
        <td id="LC2334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the soul like the spell that is in the murmur of bees. Away off in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2335"></td>
        <td id="LC2335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flaming sunshine, Cardiff Hill lifted its soft green sides through a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2336"></td>
        <td id="LC2336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shimmering veil of heat, tinted with the purple of distance; a few birds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2337"></td>
        <td id="LC2337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">floated on lazy wing high in the air; no other living thing was visible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2338"></td>
        <td id="LC2338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but some cows, and they were asleep. Tom&#39;s heart ached to be free, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2339"></td>
        <td id="LC2339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else to have something of interest to do to pass the dreary time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, I&#39;ll never love anybody but you, Tom, and I&#39;ll never marry anybody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2527"></td>
        <td id="LC2527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but you--and you ain&#39;t to ever marry anybody but me, either.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2528"></td>
        <td id="LC2528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2529"></td>
        <td id="LC2529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Certainly. Of course. That&#39;s _part_ of it. And always coming to school</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2530"></td>
        <td id="LC2530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or when we&#39;re going home, you&#39;re to walk with me, when there ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2531"></td>
        <td id="LC2531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anybody looking--and you choose me and I choose you at parties, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2532"></td>
        <td id="LC2532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that&#39;s the way you do when you&#39;re engaged.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2533"></td>
        <td id="LC2533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2534"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2535"></td>

        <td id="L2538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2538"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2539"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2541"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2542"></td>
        <td id="LC2542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The child began to cry. Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2543"></td>
        <td id="LC2543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2545"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2547"></td>
        <td id="LC2547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2548"></td>
        <td id="LC2548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom tried to put his arm about her neck, but she pushed him away and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2549"></td>
        <td id="LC2549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned her face to the wall, and went on crying. Tom tried again, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2550"></td>
        <td id="LC2550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soothing words in his mouth, and was repulsed again. Then his pride was</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2552"></td>
        <td id="LC2552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uneasy, for a while, glancing at the door, every now and then, hoping</td>

        <td id="LC2553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she would repent and come to find him. But she did not. Then he began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2554"></td>
        <td id="LC2554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to feel badly and fear that he was in the wrong. It was a hard struggle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2555"></td>
        <td id="LC2555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him to make new advances, now, but he nerved himself to it and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2556"></td>
        <td id="LC2556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered. She was still standing back there in the corner, sobbing, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2557"></td>
        <td id="LC2557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her face to the wall. Tom&#39;s heart smote him. He went to her and stood a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2558"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2559"></td>

        <td id="L2568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2568"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2569"></td>

        <td id="L2572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2572"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2574"></td>
        <td id="LC2574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hills and far away, to return to school no more that day. Presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2575"></td>
        <td id="LC2575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Becky began to suspect. She ran to the door; he was not in sight; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2576"></td>
        <td id="LC2576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flew around to the play-yard; he was not there. Then she called:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2577"></td>
        <td id="LC2577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2579"></td>
        <td id="LC2579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2580"></td>
        <td id="LC2580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She listened intently, but there was no answer. She had no companions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2581"></td>
        <td id="LC2581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but silence and loneliness. So she sat down to cry again and upbraid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2582"></td>
        <td id="LC2582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself; and by this time the scholars began to gather again, and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2583"></td>
        <td id="LC2583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had to hide her griefs and still her broken heart and take up the cross</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2584"></td>
        <td id="LC2584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a long, dreary, aching afternoon, with none among the strangers about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2585"></td>
        <td id="LC2585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her to exchange sorrows with.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2586"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2587"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2588"></td>
        <td id="LC2588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2589"></td>
        <td id="LC2589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2590"></td>
        <td id="LC2590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2591"></td>
        <td id="LC2591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2592"></td>
        <td id="LC2592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM dodged hither and thither through lanes until he was well out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2593"></td>
        <td id="LC2593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">track of returning scholars, and then fell into a moody jog. He crossed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2594"></td>
        <td id="LC2594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a small “branch” two or three times, because of a prevailing juvenile</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2595"></td>
        <td id="LC2595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">superstition that to cross water baffled pursuit. Half an hour later</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2596"></td>
        <td id="LC2596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was disappearing behind the Douglas mansion on the summit of Cardiff</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2597"></td>
        <td id="LC2597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hill, and the school-house was hardly distinguishable away off in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2598"></td>
        <td id="LC2598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">valley behind him. He entered a dense wood, picked his pathless way to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2599"></td>
        <td id="LC2599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the centre of it, and sat down on a mossy spot under a spreading oak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2600"></td>
        <td id="LC2600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was not even a zephyr stirring; the dead noonday heat had even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2601"></td>
        <td id="LC2601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stilled the songs of the birds; nature lay in a trance that was broken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2602"></td>
        <td id="LC2602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by no sound but the occasional far-off hammering of a wood-pecker, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2603"></td>
        <td id="LC2603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this seemed to render the pervading silence and sense of loneliness the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2604"></td>
        <td id="LC2604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more profound. The boy&#39;s soul was steeped in melancholy; his feelings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2605"></td>
        <td id="LC2605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were in happy accord with his surroundings. He sat long with his elbows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2606"></td>
        <td id="LC2606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on his knees and his chin in his hands, meditating. It seemed to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2607"></td>
        <td id="LC2607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that life was but a trouble, at best, and he more than half envied Jimmy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2608"></td>
        <td id="LC2608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hodges, so lately released; it must be very peaceful, he thought, to lie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2609"></td>
        <td id="LC2609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and slumber and dream forever and ever, with the wind whispering through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2610"></td>
        <td id="LC2610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the trees and caressing the grass and the flowers over the grave, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2611"></td>
        <td id="LC2611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing to bother and grieve about, ever any more. If he only had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2612"></td>
        <td id="LC2612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clean Sunday-school record he could be willing to go, and be done with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2613"></td>
        <td id="LC2613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it all. Now as to this girl. What had he done? Nothing. He had meant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2614"></td>
        <td id="LC2614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best in the world, and been treated like a dog--like a very dog. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2615"></td>
        <td id="LC2615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be sorry some day--maybe when it was too late. Ah, if he could only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2616"></td>
        <td id="LC2616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die _temporarily_!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2617"></td>
        <td id="LC2617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2618"></td>
        <td id="LC2618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the elastic heart of youth cannot be compressed into one constrained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2619"></td>
        <td id="LC2619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shape long at a time. Tom presently began to drift insensibly back into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2620"></td>
        <td id="LC2620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the concerns of this life again. What if he turned his back, now, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2621"></td>
        <td id="LC2621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappeared mysteriously? What if he went away--ever so far away, into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2622"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2623"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2624"></td>
        <td id="LC2624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to fill him with disgust. For frivolity and jokes and spotted tights</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exalted into the vague august realm of the romantic. No, he would be</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a soldier, and return after long years, all war-worn and illustrious.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2628"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2712"></td>
        <td id="LC2712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that. He said cautiously--to an imaginary company:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2713"></td>
        <td id="LC2713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2714"></td>
        <td id="LC2714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hold, my merry men! Keep hid till I blow.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2715"></td>
        <td id="LC2715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2716"></td>
        <td id="LC2716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now appeared Joe Harper, as airily clad and elaborately armed as Tom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2717"></td>
        <td id="LC2717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom called:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2718"></td>
        <td id="LC2718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2719"></td>
        <td id="LC2719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hold! Who comes here into Sherwood Forest without my pass?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2720"></td>
        <td id="LC2720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2721"></td>
        <td id="LC2721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Guy of Guisborne wants no man&#39;s pass. Who art thou that--that--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2722"></td>
        <td id="LC2722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2723"></td>
        <td id="LC2723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Dares to hold such language,” said Tom, prompting--for they talked “by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2724"></td>
        <td id="LC2724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the book,” from memory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2725"></td>
        <td id="LC2725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2726"></td>
        <td id="LC2726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Who art thou that dares to hold such language?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2727"></td>
        <td id="LC2727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2728"></td>
        <td id="LC2728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I, indeed! I am Robin Hood, as thy caitiff carcase soon shall know.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2729"></td>
        <td id="LC2729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2730"></td>
        <td id="LC2730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then art thou indeed that famous outlaw? Right gladly will I dispute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2731"></td>
        <td id="LC2731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with thee the passes of the merry wood. Have at thee!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2732"></td>
        <td id="LC2732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2733"></td>
        <td id="LC2733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They took their lath swords, dumped their other traps on the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2734"></td>
        <td id="LC2734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struck a fencing attitude, foot to foot, and began a grave, careful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2735"></td>
        <td id="LC2735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">combat, “two up and two down.” Presently Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2736"></td>
        <td id="LC2736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2737"></td>
        <td id="LC2737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, if you&#39;ve got the hang, go it lively!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2738"></td>
        <td id="LC2738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2739"></td>
        <td id="LC2739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So they “went it lively,” panting and perspiring with the work. By and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2740"></td>
        <td id="LC2740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by Tom shouted:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2741"></td>
        <td id="LC2741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2742"></td>
        <td id="LC2742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Fall! fall! Why don&#39;t you fall?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2743"></td>
        <td id="LC2743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2744"></td>
        <td id="LC2744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I sha&#39;n&#39;t! Why don&#39;t you fall yourself? You&#39;re getting the worst of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2745"></td>
        <td id="LC2745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2746"></td>
        <td id="LC2746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2747"></td>
        <td id="LC2747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, that ain&#39;t anything. I can&#39;t fall; that ain&#39;t the way it is in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2748"></td>
        <td id="LC2748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">book. The book says, &#39;Then with one back-handed stroke he slew poor Guy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2749"></td>
        <td id="LC2749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Guisborne.&#39; You&#39;re to turn around and let me hit you in the back.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2750"></td>
        <td id="LC2750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2751"></td>
        <td id="LC2751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no getting around the authorities, so Joe turned, received the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2752"></td>
        <td id="LC2752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whack and fell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2753"></td>
        <td id="LC2753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2754"></td>
        <td id="LC2754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now,” said Joe, getting up, “you got to let me kill _you_. That&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2755"></td>
        <td id="LC2755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fair.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2756"></td>
        <td id="LC2756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2757"></td>
        <td id="LC2757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, I can&#39;t do that, it ain&#39;t in the book.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2758"></td>
        <td id="LC2758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2759"></td>
        <td id="LC2759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, it&#39;s blamed mean--that&#39;s all.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2760"></td>
        <td id="LC2760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2761"></td>
        <td id="LC2761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, say, Joe, you can be Friar Tuck or Much the miller&#39;s son, and lam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2762"></td>
        <td id="LC2762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me with a quarter-staff; or I&#39;ll be the Sheriff of Nottingham and you be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2763"></td>
        <td id="LC2763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Robin Hood a little while and kill me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2764"></td>
        <td id="LC2764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2765"></td>
        <td id="LC2765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was satisfactory, and so these adventures were carried out. Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2766"></td>
        <td id="LC2766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom became Robin Hood again, and was allowed by the treacherous nun to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2767"></td>
        <td id="LC2767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bleed his strength away through his neglected wound. And at last Joe,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2768"></td>
        <td id="LC2768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">representing a whole tribe of weeping outlaws, dragged him sadly forth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2769"></td>
        <td id="LC2769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave his bow into his feeble hands, and Tom said, “Where this arrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2770"></td>
        <td id="LC2770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falls, there bury poor Robin Hood under the greenwood tree.” Then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2771"></td>
        <td id="LC2771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shot the arrow and fell back and would have died, but he lit on a nettle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2772"></td>
        <td id="LC2772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and sprang up too gaily for a corpse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2773"></td>
        <td id="LC2773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2774"></td>
        <td id="LC2774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys dressed themselves, hid their accoutrements, and went off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2775"></td>
        <td id="LC2775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grieving that there were no outlaws any more, and wondering what modern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2776"></td>
        <td id="LC2776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civilization could claim to have done to compensate for their loss.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2777"></td>
        <td id="LC2777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They said they would rather be outlaws a year in Sherwood Forest than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2778"></td>
        <td id="LC2778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">President of the United States forever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2779"></td>
        <td id="LC2779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2780"></td>
        <td id="LC2780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2781"></td>
        <td id="LC2781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2782"></td>
        <td id="LC2782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2783"></td>
        <td id="LC2783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2784"></td>
        <td id="LC2784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2785"></td>
        <td id="LC2785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AT half-past nine, that night, Tom and Sid were sent to bed, as usual.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2786"></td>
        <td id="LC2786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They said their prayers, and Sid was soon asleep. Tom lay awake and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2787"></td>
        <td id="LC2787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waited, in restless impatience. When it seemed to him that it must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2788"></td>
        <td id="LC2788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearly daylight, he heard the clock strike ten! This was despair. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2789"></td>
        <td id="LC2789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would have tossed and fidgeted, as his nerves demanded, but he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2790"></td>
        <td id="LC2790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid he might wake Sid. So he lay still, and stared up into the dark.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2791"></td>
        <td id="LC2791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Everything was dismally still. By and by, out of the stillness, little,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2792"></td>
        <td id="LC2792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scarcely perceptible noises began to emphasize themselves. The ticking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2793"></td>
        <td id="LC2793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the clock began to bring itself into notice. Old beams began to crack</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2794"></td>
        <td id="LC2794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mysteriously. The stairs creaked faintly. Evidently spirits were abroad.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2795"></td>
        <td id="LC2795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A measured, muffled snore issued from Aunt Polly&#39;s chamber. And now the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2796"></td>
        <td id="LC2796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tiresome chirping of a cricket that no human ingenuity could locate,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2797"></td>
        <td id="LC2797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began. Next the ghastly ticking of a death-watch in the wall at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2798"></td>
        <td id="LC2798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed&#39;s head made Tom shudder--it meant that somebody&#39;s days were numbered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2799"></td>
        <td id="LC2799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the howl of a far-off dog rose on the night air, and was answered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2800"></td>
        <td id="LC2800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by a fainter howl from a remoter distance. Tom was in an agony. At last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2801"></td>
        <td id="LC2801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was satisfied that time had ceased and eternity begun; he began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2802"></td>
        <td id="LC2802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doze, in spite of himself; the clock chimed eleven, but he did not hear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>
        <td id="LC2803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. And then there came, mingling with his half-formed dreams, a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2804"></td>
        <td id="LC2804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">melancholy caterwauling. The raising of a neighboring window disturbed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2805"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>

        <td id="LC2934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of shovels on it. They cast down their load and began to open the grave.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2935"></td>
        <td id="LC2935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The doctor put the lantern at the head of the grave and came and sat</td>

        <td id="LC2937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boys could have touched him.</td>

        <td id="LC2942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They growled a response and went on digging. For some time there was no</td>

        <td id="LC2946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the men had hoisted it out on the ground. They pried off the lid with</td>

        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>

        <td id="LC2949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The barrow was got ready and the corpse placed on it, covered with a</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2960"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2961"></td>
        <td id="LC2961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, and you done more than that,” said Injun Joe, approaching the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2962"></td>
        <td id="LC2962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctor, who was now standing. “Five years ago you drove me away from</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2968"></td>
        <td id="LC2968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2969"></td>
        <td id="LC2969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was threatening the doctor, with his fist in his face, by this time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>
        <td id="LC2970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The doctor struck out suddenly and stretched the ruffian on the ground.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>
        <td id="LC2971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter dropped his knife, and exclaimed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>
        <td id="LC2972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>
        <td id="LC2974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the doctor and the two were struggling with might and main,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knife, and went creeping, catlike and stooping, round and round about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the combatants, seeking an opportunity. All at once the doctor flung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter to the earth with it--and in the same instant the half-breed saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>
        <td id="LC2981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his chance and drove the knife to the hilt in the young man&#39;s breast. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same moment the clouds blotted out the dreadful spectacle and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two frightened boys went speeding away in the dark.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2986"></td>
        <td id="LC2986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently, when the moon emerged again, Injun Joe was standing over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>
        <td id="LC2987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two forms, contemplating them. The doctor murmured inarticulately, gave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2988"></td>
        <td id="LC2988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a long gasp or two and was still. The half-breed muttered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2989"></td>
        <td id="LC2989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2990"></td>
        <td id="LC2990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_That_ score is settled--damn you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2991"></td>
        <td id="LC2991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2992"></td>
        <td id="LC2992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then he robbed the body. After which he put the fatal knife in Potter&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2993"></td>
        <td id="LC2993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">open right hand, and sat down on the dismantled coffin. Three--four--five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2994"></td>
        <td id="LC2994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes passed, and then Potter began to stir and moan. His hand closed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2995"></td>
        <td id="LC2995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the knife; he raised it, glanced at it, and let it fall, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2996"></td>
        <td id="LC2996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shudder. Then he sat up, pushing the body from him, and gazed at it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2997"></td>
        <td id="LC2997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then around him, confusedly. His eyes met Joe&#39;s.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2998"></td>
        <td id="LC2998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2999"></td>
        <td id="LC2999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Lord, how is this, Joe?” he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3000"></td>
        <td id="LC3000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3001"></td>
        <td id="LC3001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s a dirty business,” said Joe, without moving.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3002"></td>
        <td id="LC3002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3003"></td>
        <td id="LC3003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What did you do it for?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3004"></td>
        <td id="LC3004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3005"></td>
        <td id="LC3005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I! I never done it!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3006"></td>
        <td id="LC3006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3007"></td>
        <td id="LC3007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Look here! That kind of talk won&#39;t wash.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3008"></td>
        <td id="LC3008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3009"></td>
        <td id="LC3009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter trembled and grew white.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3010"></td>
        <td id="LC3010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3011"></td>
        <td id="LC3011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I thought I&#39;d got sober. I&#39;d no business to drink to-night. But it&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3012"></td>
        <td id="LC3012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my head yet--worse&#39;n when we started here. I&#39;m all in a muddle;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3013"></td>
        <td id="LC3013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can&#39;t recollect anything of it, hardly. Tell me, Joe--_honest_, now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3014"></td>
        <td id="LC3014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old feller--did I do it? Joe, I never meant to--&#39;pon my soul and honor, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3015"></td>
        <td id="LC3015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never meant to, Joe. Tell me how it was, Joe. Oh, it&#39;s awful--and him so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3016"></td>
        <td id="LC3016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young and promising.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3017"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3018"></td>
        <td id="LC3018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, you two was scuffling, and he fetched you one with the headboard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3019"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC3024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, I didn&#39;t know what I was a-doing. I wish I may die this minute if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3025"></td>
        <td id="LC3025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did. It was all on account of the whiskey and the excitement, I reckon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3026"></td>
        <td id="LC3026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I never used a weepon in my life before, Joe. I&#39;ve fought, but never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3027"></td>
        <td id="LC3027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with weepons. They&#39;ll all say that. Joe, don&#39;t tell! Say you won&#39;t tell,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3028"></td>
        <td id="LC3028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe--that&#39;s a good feller. I always liked you, Joe, and stood up for you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too. Don&#39;t you remember? You _won&#39;t_ tell, _will_ you, Joe?” And the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3030"></td>
        <td id="LC3030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor creature dropped on his knees before the stolid murderer, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3031"></td>
        <td id="LC3031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clasped his appealing hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3032"></td>

        <td id="LC3033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, you&#39;ve always been fair and square with me, Muff Potter, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3034"></td>
        <td id="LC3034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">won&#39;t go back on you. There, now, that&#39;s as fair as a man can say.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3035"></td>
        <td id="LC3035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3036"></td>
        <td id="LC3036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, Joe, you&#39;re an angel. I&#39;ll bless you for this the longest day I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3037"></td>
        <td id="LC3037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">live.” And Potter began to cry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3038"></td>
        <td id="LC3038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3039"></td>
        <td id="LC3039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Come, now, that&#39;s enough of that. This ain&#39;t any time for blubbering.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3040"></td>
        <td id="LC3040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You be off yonder way and I&#39;ll go this. Move, now, and don&#39;t leave any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3041"></td>
        <td id="LC3041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tracks behind you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3042"></td>
        <td id="LC3042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3043"></td>
        <td id="LC3043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter started on a trot that quickly increased to a run. The half-breed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3044"></td>
        <td id="LC3044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood looking after him. He muttered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3045"></td>
        <td id="LC3045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3046"></td>
        <td id="LC3046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If he&#39;s as much stunned with the lick and fuddled with the rum as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3047"></td>
        <td id="LC3047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had the look of being, he won&#39;t think of the knife till he&#39;s gone so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3048"></td>
        <td id="LC3048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far he&#39;ll be afraid to come back after it to such a place by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3049"></td>
        <td id="LC3049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself--chicken-heart!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3050"></td>
        <td id="LC3050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3051"></td>
        <td id="LC3051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two or three minutes later the murdered man, the blanketed corpse, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3052"></td>
        <td id="LC3052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lidless coffin, and the open grave were under no inspection but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3053"></td>
        <td id="LC3053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moon&#39;s. The stillness was complete again, too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3054"></td>
