      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3058"></td>
        <td id="LC3058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER X</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3059"></td>
        <td id="LC3059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3060"></td>
        <td id="LC3060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE two boys flew on and on, toward the village, speechless with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3061"></td>
        <td id="LC3061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horror. They glanced backward over their shoulders from time to time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3062"></td>
        <td id="LC3062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apprehensively, as if they feared they might be followed. Every stump</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3063"></td>
        <td id="LC3063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that started up in their path seemed a man and an enemy, and made them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3064"></td>
        <td id="LC3064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">catch their breath; and as they sped by some outlying cottages that lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3065"></td>
        <td id="LC3065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">near the village, the barking of the aroused watch-dogs seemed to give</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3066"></td>
        <td id="LC3066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wings to their feet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3067"></td>
        <td id="LC3067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3068"></td>
        <td id="LC3068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If we can only get to the old tannery before we break down!” whispered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3069"></td>
        <td id="LC3069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom, in short catches between breaths. “I can&#39;t stand it much longer.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3070"></td>
        <td id="LC3070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3071"></td>
        <td id="LC3071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huckleberry&#39;s hard pantings were his only reply, and the boys fixed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3072"></td>
        <td id="LC3072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their eyes on the goal of their hopes and bent to their work to win it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3073"></td>
        <td id="LC3073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They gained steadily on it, and at last, breast to breast, they burst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3074"></td>
        <td id="LC3074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the open door and fell grateful and exhausted in the sheltering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3075"></td>
        <td id="LC3075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadows beyond. By and by their pulses slowed down, and Tom whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3076"></td>
        <td id="LC3076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3077"></td>
        <td id="LC3077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Huckleberry, what do you reckon&#39;ll come of this?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3078"></td>
        <td id="LC3078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3079"></td>
        <td id="LC3079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If Doctor Robinson dies, I reckon hanging&#39;ll come of it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3080"></td>
        <td id="LC3080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3081"></td>
        <td id="LC3081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Do you though?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3082"></td>
        <td id="LC3082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3083"></td>
        <td id="LC3083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, I _know_ it, Tom.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3084"></td>
        <td id="LC3084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3085"></td>
        <td id="LC3085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom thought a while, then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3086"></td>

        <td id="L3145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3145"></td>
        <td id="LC3145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huckleberry was filled with admiration of Tom&#39;s facility in writing, and</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3177"></td>

        <td id="L3267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3267"></td>

        <td id="L3268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3268"></td>

        <td id="L3269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3269"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3270"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3356"></td>

        <td id="L3357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3357"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3359"></td>
        <td id="LC3359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wormed his small body through the crowd and saw the dismal spectacle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3360"></td>
        <td id="LC3360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It seemed to him an age since he was there before. Somebody pinched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3361"></td>
        <td id="LC3361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his arm. He turned, and his eyes met Huckleberry&#39;s. Then both looked</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3513"></td>

        <td id="L3514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3514"></td>
        <td id="LC3514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ONE of the reasons why Tom&#39;s mind had drifted away from its secret</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3515"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3516"></td>
        <td id="LC3516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">itself about. Becky Thatcher had stopped coming to school. Tom had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3517"></td>
        <td id="LC3517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggled with his pride a few days, and tried to “whistle her down the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3518"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3519"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3520"></td>
        <td id="LC3520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should die! There was distraction in the thought. He no longer took an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3521"></td>
        <td id="LC3521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest in war, nor even in piracy. The charm of life was gone; there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3522"></td>
        <td id="LC3522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was nothing but dreariness left. He put his hoop away, and his bat;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3523"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3524"></td>
        <td id="LC3524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try all manner of remedies on him. She was one of those people who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3525"></td>
        <td id="LC3525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are infatuated with patent medicines and all new-fangled methods of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3526"></td>
        <td id="LC3526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">producing health or mending it. She was an inveterate experimenter in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3527"></td>
        <td id="LC3527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these things. When something fresh in this line came out she was in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3528"></td>
        <td id="LC3528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fever, right away, to try it; not on herself, for she was never ailing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3529"></td>
        <td id="LC3529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but on anybody else that came handy. She was a subscriber for all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3530"></td>
        <td id="LC3530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Health” periodicals and phrenological frauds; and the solemn ignorance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3531"></td>
        <td id="LC3531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were inflated with was breath to her nostrils. All the “rot” they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3532"></td>
        <td id="LC3532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contained about ventilation, and how to go to bed, and how to get up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3533"></td>
        <td id="LC3533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and what to eat, and what to drink, and how much exercise to take, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3534"></td>
        <td id="LC3534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what frame of mind to keep one&#39;s self in, and what sort of clothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3535"></td>
        <td id="LC3535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to wear, was all gospel to her, and she never observed that her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3536"></td>
        <td id="LC3536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">health-journals of the current month customarily upset everything they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3537"></td>
        <td id="LC3537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had recommended the month before. She was as simple-hearted and honest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3538"></td>
        <td id="LC3538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the day was long, and so she was an easy victim. She gathered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3539"></td>
        <td id="LC3539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together her quack periodicals and her quack medicines, and thus armed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3540"></td>
        <td id="LC3540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with death, went about on her pale horse, metaphorically speaking, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3541"></td>
        <td id="LC3541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“hell following after.” But she never suspected that she was not an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3542"></td>
        <td id="LC3542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">angel of healing and the balm of Gilead in disguise, to the suffering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3543"></td>
        <td id="LC3543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighbors.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3544"></td>
        <td id="LC3544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3545"></td>
        <td id="LC3545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The water treatment was new, now, and Tom&#39;s low condition was a windfall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3546"></td>
        <td id="LC3546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to her. She had him out at daylight every morning, stood him up in the</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3639"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3640"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3641"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3643"></td>

        <td id="LC3644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human!”</td>

        <td id="L3645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3645"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3646"></td>
        <td id="LC3646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Polly felt a sudden pang of remorse. This was putting the thing in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3647"></td>
        <td id="LC3647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a new light; what was cruelty to a cat _might_ be cruelty to a boy, too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3648"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3649"></td>
        <td id="LC3649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put her hand on Tom&#39;s head and said gently:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3650"></td>

        <td id="L3654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3654"></td>
        <td id="LC3654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through his gravity.</td>

        <td id="L3662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3662"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3663"></td>
        <td id="LC3663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom reached school ahead of time. It was noticed that this strange thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3664"></td>
        <td id="LC3664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been occurring every day latterly. And now, as usual of late,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3665"></td>
        <td id="LC3665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he hung about the gate of the schoolyard instead of playing with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3666"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be looking everywhere but whither he really was looking--down the road.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3668"></td>
        <td id="LC3668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently Jeff Thatcher hove in sight, and Tom&#39;s face lighted; he gazed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3669"></td>
        <td id="LC3669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a moment, and then turned sorrowfully away. When Jeff arrived, Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3670"></td>
        <td id="LC3670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accosted him; and “led up” warily to opportunities for remark about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3671"></td>
        <td id="LC3671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Becky, but the giddy lad never could see the bait. Tom watched and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3672"></td>
        <td id="LC3672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watched, hoping whenever a frisking frock came in sight, and hating the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3673"></td>
        <td id="LC3673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">owner of it as soon as he saw she was not the right one. At last frocks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3674"></td>
        <td id="LC3674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ceased to appear, and he dropped hopelessly into the dumps; he entered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3675"></td>
        <td id="LC3675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the empty schoolhouse and sat down to suffer. Then one more frock passed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3676"></td>
        <td id="LC3676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in at the gate, and Tom&#39;s heart gave a great bound. The next instant he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3677"></td>
        <td id="LC3677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was out, and “going on” like an Indian; yelling, laughing, chasing boys,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3678"></td>
        <td id="LC3678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jumping over the fence at risk of life and limb, throwing handsprings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3679"></td>
        <td id="LC3679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">standing on his head--doing all the heroic things he could conceive of,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3680"></td>
        <td id="LC3680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and keeping a furtive eye out, all the while, to see if Becky Thatcher</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3681"></td>
        <td id="LC3681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was noticing. But she seemed to be unconscious of it all; she never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3682"></td>
        <td id="LC3682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked. Could it be possible that she was not aware that he was there?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3683"></td>
        <td id="LC3683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He carried his exploits to her immediate vicinity; came war-whooping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3684"></td>
        <td id="LC3684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around, snatched a boy&#39;s cap, hurled it to the roof of the schoolhouse,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3685"></td>
        <td id="LC3685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broke through a group of boys, tumbling them in every direction, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3686"></td>
        <td id="LC3686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell sprawling, himself, under Becky&#39;s nose, almost upsetting her--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3687"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3688"></td>
        <td id="LC3688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people think they&#39;re mighty smart--always showing off!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3689"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3690"></td>
        <td id="LC3690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom&#39;s cheeks burned. He gathered himself up and sneaked off, crushed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3691"></td>

        <td id="L3694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3694"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3695"></td>
