      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3696"></td>
        <td id="LC3696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3697"></td>
        <td id="LC3697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3698"></td>
        <td id="LC3698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM&#39;S mind was made up now. He was gloomy and desperate. He was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3699"></td>
        <td id="LC3699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forsaken, friendless boy, he said; nobody loved him; when they found out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3700"></td>
        <td id="LC3700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what they had driven him to, perhaps they would be sorry; he had tried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3701"></td>
        <td id="LC3701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do right and get along, but they would not let him; since nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3702"></td>
        <td id="LC3702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would do them but to be rid of him, let it be so; and let them blame</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3703"></td>
        <td id="LC3703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_him_ for the consequences--why shouldn&#39;t they? What right had the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3704"></td>
        <td id="LC3704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friendless to complain? Yes, they had forced him to it at last: he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3705"></td>
        <td id="LC3705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lead a life of crime. There was no choice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3706"></td>
        <td id="LC3706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3707"></td>
        <td id="LC3707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By this time he was far down Meadow Lane, and the bell for school to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3708"></td>
        <td id="LC3708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“take up” tinkled faintly upon his ear. He sobbed, now, to think he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3709"></td>
        <td id="LC3709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should never, never hear that old familiar sound any more--it was very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3710"></td>
        <td id="LC3710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hard, but it was forced on him; since he was driven out into the cold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3711"></td>
        <td id="LC3711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world, he must submit--but he forgave them. Then the sobs came thick and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3712"></td>
        <td id="LC3712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fast.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3713"></td>
        <td id="LC3713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3714"></td>
        <td id="LC3714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just at this point he met his soul&#39;s sworn comrade, Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3715"></td>
        <td id="LC3715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harper--hard-eyed, and with evidently a great and dismal purpose in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3716"></td>
        <td id="LC3716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart. Plainly here were “two souls with but a single thought.” Tom,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3717"></td>
        <td id="LC3717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wiping his eyes with his sleeve, began to blubber out something about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3718"></td>
        <td id="LC3718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a resolution to escape from hard usage and lack of sympathy at home by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3719"></td>
        <td id="LC3719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roaming abroad into the great world never to return; and ended by hoping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3720"></td>
        <td id="LC3720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Joe would not forget him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3721"></td>
        <td id="LC3721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>
        <td id="LC3722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But it transpired that this was a request which Joe had just been going</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3723"></td>
        <td id="LC3723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to make of Tom, and had come to hunt him up for that purpose. His mother</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3724"></td>
        <td id="LC3724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had whipped him for drinking some cream which he had never tasted and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3725"></td>
        <td id="LC3725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew nothing about; it was plain that she was tired of him and wished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>
        <td id="LC3726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him to go; if she felt that way, there was nothing for him to do but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3727"></td>
        <td id="LC3727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succumb; he hoped she would be happy, and never regret having driven her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3728"></td>
        <td id="LC3728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor boy out into the unfeeling world to suffer and die.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3729"></td>
        <td id="LC3729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3730"></td>
        <td id="LC3730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the two boys walked sorrowing along, they made a new compact to stand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3731"></td>
        <td id="LC3731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by each other and be brothers and never separate till death relieved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>
        <td id="LC3732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them of their troubles. Then they began to lay their plans. Joe was for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>
        <td id="LC3733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being a hermit, and living on crusts in a remote cave, and dying,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3734"></td>
        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some time, of cold and want and grief; but after listening to Tom, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3735"></td>
        <td id="LC3735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conceded that there were some conspicuous advantages about a life of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>
        <td id="LC3736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crime, and so he consented to be a pirate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3738"></td>
        <td id="LC3738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three miles below St. Petersburg, at a point where the Mississippi River</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a trifle over a mile wide, there was a long, narrow, wooded island,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a shallow bar at the head of it, and this offered well as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rendezvous. It was not inhabited; it lay far over toward the further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shore, abreast a dense and almost wholly unpeopled forest. So Jackson&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Island was chosen. Who were to be the subjects of their piracies was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3744"></td>
        <td id="LC3744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter that did not occur to them. Then they hunted up Huckleberry Finn,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>
        <td id="LC3745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he joined them promptly, for all careers were one to him; he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>
        <td id="LC3746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indifferent. They presently separated to meet at a lonely spot on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3747"></td>
        <td id="LC3747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">river-bank two miles above the village at the favorite hour--which was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>
        <td id="LC3748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">midnight. There was a small log raft there which they meant to capture.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3749"></td>
        <td id="LC3749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Each would bring hooks and lines, and such provision as he could steal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3750"></td>
        <td id="LC3750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the most dark and mysterious way--as became outlaws. And before the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3751"></td>
        <td id="LC3751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afternoon was done, they had all managed to enjoy the sweet glory of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spreading the fact that pretty soon the town would “hear something.” All</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who got this vague hint were cautioned to “be mum and wait.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">About midnight Tom arrived with a boiled ham and a few trifles,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and stopped in a dense undergrowth on a small bluff overlooking the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meeting-place. It was starlight, and very still. The mighty river lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like an ocean at rest. Tom listened a moment, but no sound disturbed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quiet. Then he gave a low, distinct whistle. It was answered from under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>
        <td id="LC3760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bluff. Tom whistled twice more; these signals were answered in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>
        <td id="LC3761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same way. Then a guarded voice said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>
        <td id="LC3762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Who goes there?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>
        <td id="LC3765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom Sawyer, the Black Avenger of the Spanish Main. Name your names.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3766"></td>
        <td id="LC3766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Huck Finn the Red-Handed, and Joe Harper the Terror of the Seas.” Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3768"></td>
        <td id="LC3768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had furnished these titles, from his favorite literature.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3769"></td>
        <td id="LC3769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3770"></td>
        <td id="LC3770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Tis well. Give the countersign.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>
        <td id="LC3772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two hoarse whispers delivered the same awful word simultaneously to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3773"></td>
        <td id="LC3773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brooding night:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>
        <td id="LC3774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3775"></td>
        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_Blood_!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3776"></td>
        <td id="LC3776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>
        <td id="LC3777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Tom tumbled his ham over the bluff and let himself down after it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tearing both skin and clothes to some extent in the effort. There was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>
        <td id="LC3779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an easy, comfortable path along the shore under the bluff, but it lacked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3780"></td>
        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the advantages of difficulty and danger so valued by a pirate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>
        <td id="LC3781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3782"></td>
        <td id="LC3782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Terror of the Seas had brought a side of bacon, and had about worn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3783"></td>
        <td id="LC3783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself out with getting it there. Finn the Red-Handed had stolen a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3784"></td>
        <td id="LC3784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skillet and a quantity of half-cured leaf tobacco, and had also brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3785"></td>
        <td id="LC3785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a few corn-cobs to make pipes with. But none of the pirates smoked or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3786"></td>
        <td id="LC3786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“chewed” but himself. The Black Avenger of the Spanish Main said it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3787"></td>
        <td id="LC3787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would never do to start without some fire. That was a wise thought;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3788"></td>
        <td id="LC3788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matches were hardly known there in that day. They saw a fire smouldering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3789"></td>
        <td id="LC3789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon a great raft a hundred yards above, and they went stealthily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3790"></td>
        <td id="LC3790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thither and helped themselves to a chunk. They made an imposing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3791"></td>
        <td id="LC3791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adventure of it, saying, “Hist!” every now and then, and suddenly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3792"></td>
        <td id="LC3792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">halting with finger on lip; moving with hands on imaginary dagger-hilts;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3793"></td>
        <td id="LC3793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and giving orders in dismal whispers that if “the foe” stirred, to “let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3794"></td>
        <td id="LC3794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him have it to the hilt,” because “dead men tell no tales.” They knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3795"></td>
        <td id="LC3795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well enough that the raftsmen were all down at the village laying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3796"></td>
        <td id="LC3796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in stores or having a spree, but still that was no excuse for their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3797"></td>
        <td id="LC3797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conducting this thing in an unpiratical way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3798"></td>
        <td id="LC3798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3799"></td>
        <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They shoved off, presently, Tom in command, Huck at the after oar and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3800"></td>
        <td id="LC3800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe at the forward. Tom stood amidships, gloomy-browed, and with folded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3801"></td>
        <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arms, and gave his orders in a low, stern whisper:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3802"></td>
        <td id="LC3802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3803"></td>
        <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Luff, and bring her to the wind!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3804"></td>
        <td id="LC3804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3805"></td>
        <td id="LC3805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Aye-aye, sir!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3806"></td>
        <td id="LC3806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3807"></td>
        <td id="LC3807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Steady, steady-y-y-y!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3808"></td>
        <td id="LC3808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3809"></td>
        <td id="LC3809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Steady it is, sir!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3810"></td>
        <td id="LC3810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3811"></td>
        <td id="LC3811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Let her go off a point!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3812"></td>
        <td id="LC3812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3813"></td>
        <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Point it is, sir!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>
        <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>
        <td id="LC3815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the boys steadily and monotonously drove the raft toward mid-stream</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3816"></td>
        <td id="LC3816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was no doubt understood that these orders were given only for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3817"></td>
        <td id="LC3817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“style,” and were not intended to mean anything in particular.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3818"></td>
        <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3819"></td>
        <td id="LC3819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What sail&#39;s she carrying?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>
        <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3821"></td>
        <td id="LC3821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Courses, tops&#39;ls, and flying-jib, sir.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3822"></td>
        <td id="LC3822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>
        <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Send the r&#39;yals up! Lay out aloft, there, half a dozen of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ye--foretopmaststuns&#39;l! Lively, now!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3825"></td>
        <td id="LC3825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3826"></td>
        <td id="LC3826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Aye-aye, sir!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3827"></td>
        <td id="LC3827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3828"></td>
        <td id="LC3828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Shake out that maintogalans&#39;l! Sheets and braces! _now_ my hearties!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3829"></td>
        <td id="LC3829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3830"></td>
        <td id="LC3830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Aye-aye, sir!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3831"></td>
        <td id="LC3831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3832"></td>
        <td id="LC3832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hellum-a-lee--hard a port! Stand by to meet her when she comes! Port,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3833"></td>
        <td id="LC3833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">port! _Now_, men! With a will! Stead-y-y-y!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3834"></td>
        <td id="LC3834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3835"></td>
        <td id="LC3835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Steady it is, sir!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3836"></td>
        <td id="LC3836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3837"></td>
        <td id="LC3837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The raft drew beyond the middle of the river; the boys pointed her head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3838"></td>
        <td id="LC3838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right, and then lay on their oars. The river was not high, so there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3839"></td>
        <td id="LC3839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not more than a two or three mile current. Hardly a word was said during</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3840"></td>
        <td id="LC3840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the next three-quarters of an hour. Now the raft was passing before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3841"></td>
        <td id="LC3841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the distant town. Two or three glimmering lights showed where it lay,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3842"></td>
        <td id="LC3842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peacefully sleeping, beyond the vague vast sweep of star-gemmed water,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3843"></td>
        <td id="LC3843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unconscious of the tremendous event that was happening. The Black</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3844"></td>
        <td id="LC3844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Avenger stood still with folded arms, “looking his last” upon the scene</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3845"></td>
        <td id="LC3845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his former joys and his later sufferings, and wishing “she” could see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3846"></td>
        <td id="LC3846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him now, abroad on the wild sea, facing peril and death with dauntless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3847"></td>
        <td id="LC3847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart, going to his doom with a grim smile on his lips. It was but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3848"></td>
        <td id="LC3848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a small strain on his imagination to remove Jackson&#39;s Island beyond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3849"></td>
        <td id="LC3849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eye-shot of the village, and so he “looked his last” with a broken and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3850"></td>
        <td id="LC3850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied heart. The other pirates were looking their last, too; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3851"></td>
        <td id="LC3851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they all looked so long that they came near letting the current drift</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3852"></td>
        <td id="LC3852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them out of the range of the island. But they discovered the danger in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3853"></td>
        <td id="LC3853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and made shift to avert it. About two o&#39;clock in the morning the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3854"></td>
        <td id="LC3854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raft grounded on the bar two hundred yards above the head of the island,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3855"></td>
        <td id="LC3855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and they waded back and forth until they had landed their freight. Part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3856"></td>
        <td id="LC3856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the little raft&#39;s belongings consisted of an old sail, and this they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3857"></td>
        <td id="LC3857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spread over a nook in the bushes for a tent to shelter their provisions;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3858"></td>
        <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but they themselves would sleep in the open air in good weather, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>
        <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">became outlaws.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3860"></td>
        <td id="LC3860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3861"></td>
        <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They built a fire against the side of a great log twenty or thirty steps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>
        <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within the sombre depths of the forest, and then cooked some bacon in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>
        <td id="LC3863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the frying-pan for supper, and used up half of the corn “pone” stock</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3864"></td>
        <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had brought. It seemed glorious sport to be feasting in that wild,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3865"></td>
        <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">free way in the virgin forest of an unexplored and uninhabited island,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3866"></td>
        <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far from the haunts of men, and they said they never would return to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civilization. The climbing fire lit up their faces and threw its ruddy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glare upon the pillared tree-trunks of their forest temple, and upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">varnished foliage and festooning vines.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the last crisp slice of bacon was gone, and the last allowance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>
        <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of corn pone devoured, the boys stretched themselves out on the grass,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3873"></td>
        <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filled with contentment. They could have found a cooler place, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>
        <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would not deny themselves such a romantic feature as the roasting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">campfire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3876"></td>
        <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>
        <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_Ain&#39;t_ it gay?” said Joe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3878"></td>
        <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s _nuts_!” said Tom. “What would the boys say if they could see us?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3880"></td>
        <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>
        <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Say? Well, they&#39;d just die to be here--hey, Hucky!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>
        <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3883"></td>
        <td id="LC3883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I reckon so,” said Huckleberry; “anyways, I&#39;m suited. I don&#39;t want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3884"></td>
        <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing better&#39;n this. I don&#39;t ever get enough to eat, gen&#39;ally--and here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3885"></td>
        <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they can&#39;t come and pick at a feller and bullyrag him so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3886"></td>
        <td id="LC3886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3887"></td>
        <td id="LC3887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s just the life for me,” said Tom. “You don&#39;t have to get up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3888"></td>
        <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mornings, and you don&#39;t have to go to school, and wash, and all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3889"></td>
        <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blame foolishness. You see a pirate don&#39;t have to do _anything_, Joe,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>
        <td id="LC3890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he&#39;s ashore, but a hermit _he_ has to be praying considerable, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>
        <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then he don&#39;t have any fun, anyway, all by himself that way.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>
        <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3893"></td>
        <td id="LC3893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh yes, that&#39;s so,” said Joe, “but I hadn&#39;t thought much about it, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3894"></td>
        <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know. I&#39;d a good deal rather be a pirate, now that I&#39;ve tried it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>
        <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3896"></td>
        <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You see,” said Tom, “people don&#39;t go much on hermits, nowadays, like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>
        <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they used to in old times, but a pirate&#39;s always respected. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>
        <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hermit&#39;s got to sleep on the hardest place he can find, and put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>
        <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sackcloth and ashes on his head, and stand out in the rain, and--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What does he put sackcloth and ashes on his head for?” inquired Huck.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I dono. But they&#39;ve _got_ to do it. Hermits always do. You&#39;d have to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>
        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that if you was a hermit.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Dern&#39;d if I would,” said Huck.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, what would you do?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I dono. But I wouldn&#39;t do that.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, Huck, you&#39;d _have_ to. How&#39;d you get around it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, I just wouldn&#39;t stand it. I&#39;d run away.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Run away! Well, you _would_ be a nice old slouch of a hermit. You&#39;d be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a disgrace.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Red-Handed made no response, being better employed. He had finished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gouging out a cob, and now he fitted a weed stem to it, loaded it with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tobacco, and was pressing a coal to the charge and blowing a cloud of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fragrant smoke--he was in the full bloom of luxurious contentment. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other pirates envied him this majestic vice, and secretly resolved to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquire it shortly. Presently Huck said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What does pirates have to do?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, they have just a bully time--take ships and burn them, and get the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money and bury it in awful places in their island where there&#39;s ghosts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and things to watch it, and kill everybody in the ships--make &#39;em walk a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plank.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And they carry the women to the island,” said Joe; “they don&#39;t kill the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">women.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
        <td id="LC3938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No,” assented Tom, “they don&#39;t kill the women--they&#39;re too noble. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the women&#39;s always beautiful, too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and di&#39;monds,” said Joe, with enthusiasm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Who?” said Huck.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, the pirates.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck scanned his own clothing forlornly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I reckon I ain&#39;t dressed fitten for a pirate,” said he, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regretful pathos in his voice; “but I ain&#39;t got none but these.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the other boys told him the fine clothes would come fast enough,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after they should have begun their adventures. They made him understand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that his poor rags would do to begin with, though it was customary for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wealthy pirates to start with a proper wardrobe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gradually their talk died out and drowsiness began to steal upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyelids of the little waifs. The pipe dropped from the fingers of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Red-Handed, and he slept the sleep of the conscience-free and the weary.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Terror of the Seas and the Black Avenger of the Spanish Main had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more difficulty in getting to sleep. They said their prayers inwardly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and lying down, since there was nobody there with authority to make them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kneel and recite aloud; in truth, they had a mind not to say them at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all, but they were afraid to proceed to such lengths as that, lest they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might call down a sudden and special thunderbolt from heaven. Then at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once they reached and hovered upon the imminent verge of sleep--but an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intruder came, now, that would not “down.” It was conscience. They began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to feel a vague fear that they had been doing wrong to run away; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next they thought of the stolen meat, and then the real torture came.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They tried to argue it away by reminding conscience that they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purloined sweetmeats and apples scores of times; but conscience was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>
        <td id="LC3973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be appeased by such thin plausibilities; it seemed to them, in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3974"></td>
        <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end, that there was no getting around the stubborn fact that taking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>
        <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweetmeats was only “hooking,” while taking bacon and hams and such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">valuables was plain simple stealing--and there was a command against that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the Bible. So they inwardly resolved that so long as they remained in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the business, their piracies should not again be sullied with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3979"></td>
        <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crime of stealing. Then conscience granted a truce, and these curiously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>
        <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inconsistent pirates fell peacefully to sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3981"></td>
        <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3982"></td>
        <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3983"></td>
        <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>
        <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>
        <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XIV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3986"></td>
        <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>
        <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">WHEN Tom awoke in the morning, he wondered where he was. He sat up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>
        <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rubbed his eyes and looked around. Then he comprehended. It was the cool</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>
        <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gray dawn, and there was a delicious sense of repose and peace in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>
        <td id="LC3990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deep pervading calm and silence of the woods. Not a leaf stirred; not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sound obtruded upon great Nature&#39;s meditation. Beaded dewdrops stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the leaves and grasses. A white layer of ashes covered the fire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a thin blue breath of smoke rose straight into the air. Joe and Huck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still slept.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, far away in the woods a bird called; another answered; presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hammering of a woodpecker was heard. Gradually the cool dim gray</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the morning whitened, and as gradually sounds multiplied and life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3999"></td>
        <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manifested itself. The marvel of Nature shaking off sleep and going</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>
        <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to work unfolded itself to the musing boy. A little green worm came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crawling over a dewy leaf, lifting two-thirds of his body into the air</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from time to time and “sniffing around,” then proceeding again--for he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>
        <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was measuring, Tom said; and when the worm approached him, of its own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4004"></td>
        <td id="LC4004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accord, he sat as still as a stone, with his hopes rising and falling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4005"></td>
        <td id="LC4005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by turns, as the creature still came toward him or seemed inclined to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4006"></td>
        <td id="LC4006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go elsewhere; and when at last it considered a painful moment with its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
        <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curved body in the air and then came decisively down upon Tom&#39;s leg and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began a journey over him, his whole heart was glad--for that meant that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was going to have a new suit of clothes--without the shadow of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt a gaudy piratical uniform. Now a procession of ants appeared,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>

        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, “Lady-bug, lady-bug, fly away home, your house is on fire, your</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>
        <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom touched the creature, to see it shut its legs against its body</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">catbird, the Northern mocker, lit in a tree over Tom&#39;s head, and trilled</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a shrill jay swept down, a flash of blue flame, and stopped on a twig</td>

        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>

        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4089"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4091"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>
        <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4094"></td>
        <td id="LC4094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Tain&#39;t thunder,” said Huckleberry, in an awed tone, “becuz thunder--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>
        <td id="LC4095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4096"></td>
        <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hark!” said Tom. “Listen--don&#39;t talk.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>
        <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They waited a time that seemed an age, and then the same muffled boom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>
        <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">troubled the solemn hush.</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4103"></td>
        <td id="LC4103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They sprang to their feet and hurried to the shore toward the town. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4104"></td>
        <td id="LC4104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parted the bushes on the bank and peered out over the water. The little</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4105"></td>
        <td id="LC4105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steam ferry-boat was about a mile below the village, drifting with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4106"></td>

        <td id="LC4110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ferryboat&#39;s side, and as it expanded and rose in a lazy cloud, that same</td>

        <td id="L4112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4112"></td>

        <td id="L4113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4113"></td>
        <td id="LC4113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know now!” exclaimed Tom; “somebody&#39;s drownded!”</td>

        <td id="LC4136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gravity.</td>

        <td id="L4139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4139"></td>

        <td id="L4141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4141"></td>

        <td id="L4142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4142"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4143"></td>
        <td id="LC4143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flashed through Tom&#39;s mind, and he exclaimed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4144"></td>
        <td id="LC4144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4145"></td>

        <td id="L4146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4146"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4147"></td>
        <td id="LC4147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They felt like heroes in an instant. Here was a gorgeous triumph; they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4148"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4150"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4152"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
