        <td id="LC4153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concerned. This was fine. It was worth while to be a pirate, after all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4155"></td>
        <td id="LC4155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As twilight drew on, the ferryboat went back to her accustomed business</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4156"></td>
        <td id="LC4156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the skiffs disappeared. The pirates returned to camp. They were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4157"></td>
        <td id="LC4157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jubilant with vanity over their new grandeur and the illustrious trouble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4158"></td>

        <td id="LC4160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the pictures they drew of the public distress on their account were</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4161"></td>

        <td id="L4164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4164"></td>

        <td id="L4165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4165"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4170"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4171"></td>

        <td id="L4172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4172"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4176"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4177"></td>
        <td id="LC4177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the night deepened, Huck began to nod, and presently to snore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4178"></td>
        <td id="LC4178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe followed next. Tom lay upon his elbow motionless, for some time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4179"></td>
        <td id="LC4179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching the two intently. At last he got up cautiously, on his knees,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4180"></td>
        <td id="LC4180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and went searching among the grass and the flickering reflections flung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4181"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4182"></td>
        <td id="LC4182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the thin white bark of a sycamore, and finally chose two which seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4183"></td>
        <td id="LC4183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to suit him. Then he knelt by the fire and painfully wrote something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4184"></td>
        <td id="LC4184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon each of these with his “red keel”; one he rolled up and put in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4185"></td>
        <td id="LC4185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jacket pocket, and the other he put in Joe&#39;s hat and removed it to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4186"></td>
        <td id="LC4186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little distance from the owner. And he also put into the hat certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4187"></td>
        <td id="LC4187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">schoolboy treasures of almost inestimable value--among them a lump of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4188"></td>
        <td id="LC4188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chalk, an India-rubber ball, three fishhooks, and one of that kind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4189"></td>
        <td id="LC4189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of marbles known as a “sure &#39;nough crystal.” Then he tiptoed his way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4190"></td>
        <td id="LC4190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cautiously among the trees till he felt that he was out of hearing, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4191"></td>
        <td id="LC4191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straightway broke into a keen run in the direction of the sandbar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4192"></td>
        <td id="LC4192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4193"></td>
        <td id="LC4193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4194"></td>
        <td id="LC4194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4195"></td>
        <td id="LC4195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4196"></td>
        <td id="LC4196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4197"></td>
        <td id="LC4197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4198"></td>
        <td id="LC4198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A few minutes later Tom was in the shoal water of the bar, wading toward</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4199"></td>
        <td id="LC4199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Illinois shore. Before the depth reached his middle he was halfway</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4200"></td>
        <td id="LC4200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over; the current would permit no more wading, now, so he struck out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4201"></td>
        <td id="LC4201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confidently to swim the remaining hundred yards. He swam quartering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4202"></td>
        <td id="LC4202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upstream, but still was swept downward rather faster than he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4203"></td>
        <td id="LC4203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected. However, he reached the shore finally, and drifted along till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4204"></td>
        <td id="LC4204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he found a low place and drew himself out. He put his hand on his jacket</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4205"></td>
        <td id="LC4205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pocket, found his piece of bark safe, and then struck through the woods,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4206"></td>
        <td id="LC4206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following the shore, with streaming garments. Shortly before ten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4207"></td>
        <td id="LC4207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">o&#39;clock he came out into an open place opposite the village, and saw the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4208"></td>
        <td id="LC4208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ferryboat lying in the shadow of the trees and the high bank. Everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4209"></td>
        <td id="LC4209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was quiet under the blinking stars. He crept down the bank, watching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4210"></td>
        <td id="LC4210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all his eyes, slipped into the water, swam three or four strokes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4211"></td>
        <td id="LC4211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and climbed into the skiff that did “yawl” duty at the boat&#39;s stern. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4212"></td>
        <td id="LC4212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laid himself down under the thwarts and waited, panting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4213"></td>
        <td id="LC4213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4214"></td>
        <td id="LC4214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently the cracked bell tapped and a voice gave the order to “cast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4215"></td>
        <td id="LC4215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off.” A minute or two later the skiff&#39;s head was standing high up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4216"></td>
        <td id="LC4216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the boat&#39;s swell, and the voyage was begun. Tom felt happy in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4217"></td>
        <td id="LC4217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his success, for he knew it was the boat&#39;s last trip for the night. At</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4218"></td>
        <td id="LC4218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the end of a long twelve or fifteen minutes the wheels stopped, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4219"></td>
        <td id="LC4219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom slipped overboard and swam ashore in the dusk, landing fifty yards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4220"></td>
        <td id="LC4220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">downstream, out of danger of possible stragglers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4221"></td>
        <td id="LC4221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4222"></td>
        <td id="LC4222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He flew along unfrequented alleys, and shortly found himself at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4223"></td>
        <td id="LC4223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aunt&#39;s back fence. He climbed over, approached the “ell,” and looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4224"></td>
        <td id="LC4224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in at the sitting-room window, for a light was burning there. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4225"></td>
        <td id="LC4225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sat Aunt Polly, Sid, Mary, and Joe Harper&#39;s mother, grouped together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4226"></td>
        <td id="LC4226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talking. They were by the bed, and the bed was between them and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4227"></td>
        <td id="LC4227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door. Tom went to the door and began to softly lift the latch; then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4228"></td>
        <td id="LC4228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he pressed gently and the door yielded a crack; he continued pushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4229"></td>
        <td id="LC4229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cautiously, and quaking every time it creaked, till he judged he might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4230"></td>
        <td id="LC4230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squeeze through on his knees; so he put his head through and began,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4231"></td>
        <td id="LC4231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4232"></td>
        <td id="LC4232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4233"></td>
        <td id="LC4233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What makes the candle blow so?” said Aunt Polly. Tom hurried up. “Why,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4234"></td>
        <td id="LC4234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that door&#39;s open, I believe. Why, of course it is. No end of strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4235"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4236"></td>
        <td id="LC4236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4237"></td>
        <td id="LC4237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom disappeared under the bed just in time. He lay and “breathed”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4238"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4239"></td>
        <td id="LC4239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aunt&#39;s foot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4240"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4241"></td>
        <td id="LC4241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But as I was saying,” said Aunt Polly, “he warn&#39;t _bad_, so to say--only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4242"></td>
        <td id="LC4242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">misch_ee_vous. Only just giddy, and harum-scarum, you know. He warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4243"></td>
        <td id="LC4243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any more responsible than a colt. _He_ never meant any harm, and he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4244"></td>
        <td id="LC4244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best-hearted boy that ever was”--and she began to cry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4245"></td>
        <td id="LC4245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4246"></td>
        <td id="LC4246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was just so with my Joe--always full of his devilment, and up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4247"></td>
        <td id="LC4247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every kind of mischief, but he was just as unselfish and kind as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4248"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4249"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4251"></td>
        <td id="LC4251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never, poor abused boy!” And Mrs. Harper sobbed as if her heart would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4252"></td>
        <td id="LC4252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">break.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4253"></td>
        <td id="LC4253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4254"></td>
        <td id="LC4254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I hope Tom&#39;s better off where he is,” said Sid, “but if he&#39;d been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4255"></td>
        <td id="LC4255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better in some ways--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4256"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4257"></td>
        <td id="LC4257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_Sid!_” Tom felt the glare of the old lady&#39;s eye, though he could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4258"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4259"></td>
        <td id="LC4259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of _him_--never you trouble _your_self, sir! Oh, Mrs. Harper, I don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4260"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4261"></td>
        <td id="LC4261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comfort to me, although he tormented my old heart out of me, &#39;most.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4262"></td>
        <td id="LC4262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4263"></td>
        <td id="LC4263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The Lord giveth and the Lord hath taken away--Blessed be the name of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4264"></td>
        <td id="LC4264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Lord! But it&#39;s so hard--Oh, it&#39;s so hard! Only last Saturday my Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4265"></td>
        <td id="LC4265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">busted a firecracker right under my nose and I knocked him sprawling.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4266"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4268"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4269"></td>
        <td id="LC4269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, yes, yes, I know just how you feel, Mrs. Harper, I know just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4270"></td>
        <td id="LC4270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactly how you feel. No longer ago than yesterday noon, my Tom took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4271"></td>
        <td id="LC4271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and filled the cat full of Pain-killer, and I did think the cretur would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4272"></td>
        <td id="LC4272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tear the house down. And God forgive me, I cracked Tom&#39;s head with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4273"></td>
        <td id="LC4273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thimble, poor boy, poor dead boy. But he&#39;s out of all his troubles now.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4274"></td>
        <td id="LC4274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the last words I ever heard him say was to reproach--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4275"></td>
        <td id="LC4275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4276"></td>
        <td id="LC4276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But this memory was too much for the old lady, and she broke entirely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4277"></td>
        <td id="LC4277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down. Tom was snuffling, now, himself--and more in pity of himself than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4278"></td>
        <td id="LC4278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anybody else. He could hear Mary crying, and putting in a kindly word</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4279"></td>
        <td id="LC4279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for him from time to time. He began to have a nobler opinion of himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4280"></td>
        <td id="LC4280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than ever before. Still, he was sufficiently touched by his aunt&#39;s grief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4281"></td>
        <td id="LC4281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to long to rush out from under the bed and overwhelm her with joy--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4282"></td>
        <td id="LC4282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the theatrical gorgeousness of the thing appealed strongly to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4283"></td>
        <td id="LC4283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature, too, but he resisted and lay still.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4284"></td>
        <td id="LC4284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4285"></td>
        <td id="LC4285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He went on listening, and gathered by odds and ends that it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4286"></td>
        <td id="LC4286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjectured at first that the boys had got drowned while taking a swim;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4287"></td>
        <td id="LC4287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then the small raft had been missed; next, certain boys said the missing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4288"></td>
        <td id="LC4288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lads had promised that the village should “hear something” soon; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4289"></td>
        <td id="LC4289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wise-heads had “put this and that together” and decided that the lads</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4290"></td>
        <td id="LC4290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had gone off on that raft and would turn up at the next town below,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4291"></td>
        <td id="LC4291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presently; but toward noon the raft had been found, lodged against the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4292"></td>
        <td id="LC4292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Missouri shore some five or six miles below the village--and then hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4293"></td>
        <td id="LC4293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perished; they must be drowned, else hunger would have driven them home</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4294"></td>
        <td id="LC4294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by nightfall if not sooner. It was believed that the search for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4295"></td>
        <td id="LC4295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bodies had been a fruitless effort merely because the drowning must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4296"></td>
        <td id="LC4296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have occurred in mid-channel, since the boys, being good swimmers, would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4297"></td>
        <td id="LC4297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">otherwise have escaped to shore. This was Wednesday night. If the bodies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4298"></td>
        <td id="LC4298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued missing until Sunday, all hope would be given over, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4299"></td>
        <td id="LC4299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">funerals would be preached on that morning. Tom shuddered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4300"></td>
        <td id="LC4300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4301"></td>
        <td id="LC4301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Harper gave a sobbing goodnight and turned to go. Then with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4302"></td>
        <td id="LC4302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mutual impulse the two bereaved women flung themselves into each other&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4303"></td>
        <td id="LC4303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arms and had a good, consoling cry, and then parted. Aunt Polly was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4304"></td>
        <td id="LC4304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tender far beyond her wont, in her goodnight to Sid and Mary. Sid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4305"></td>
        <td id="LC4305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snuffled a bit and Mary went off crying with all her heart.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4306"></td>
        <td id="LC4306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4307"></td>
        <td id="LC4307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Polly knelt down and prayed for Tom so touchingly, so appealingly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4308"></td>
        <td id="LC4308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and with such measureless love in her words and her old trembling voice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4309"></td>
        <td id="LC4309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he was weltering in tears again, long before she was through.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4310"></td>
        <td id="LC4310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4311"></td>
        <td id="LC4311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had to keep still long after she went to bed, for she kept making</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4312"></td>
        <td id="LC4312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broken-hearted ejaculations from time to time, tossing unrestfully, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4313"></td>
        <td id="LC4313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turning over. But at last she was still, only moaning a little in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4314"></td>
        <td id="LC4314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep. Now the boy stole out, rose gradually by the bedside, shaded the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4315"></td>
        <td id="LC4315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">candle-light with his hand, and stood regarding her. His heart was full</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4316"></td>
        <td id="LC4316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of pity for her. He took out his sycamore scroll and placed it by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4317"></td>
        <td id="LC4317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">candle. But something occurred to him, and he lingered considering.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4318"></td>
        <td id="LC4318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His face lighted with a happy solution of his thought; he put the bark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4319"></td>
        <td id="LC4319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hastily in his pocket. Then he bent over and kissed the faded lips, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4320"></td>
        <td id="LC4320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straightway made his stealthy exit, latching the door behind him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4321"></td>
        <td id="LC4321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4322"></td>
        <td id="LC4322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He threaded his way back to the ferry landing, found nobody at large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4323"></td>
        <td id="LC4323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there, and walked boldly on board the boat, for he knew she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4324"></td>
        <td id="LC4324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tenantless except that there was a watchman, who always turned in and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4325"></td>
        <td id="LC4325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slept like a graven image. He untied the skiff at the stern, slipped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4326"></td>
        <td id="LC4326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into it, and was soon rowing cautiously upstream. When he had pulled a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4327"></td>
        <td id="LC4327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mile above the village, he started quartering across and bent himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4328"></td>
        <td id="LC4328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stoutly to his work. He hit the landing on the other side neatly, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4329"></td>
        <td id="LC4329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this was a familiar bit of work to him. He was moved to capture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4330"></td>
        <td id="LC4330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the skiff, arguing that it might be considered a ship and therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4331"></td>
        <td id="LC4331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legitimate prey for a pirate, but he knew a thorough search would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4332"></td>
        <td id="LC4332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made for it and that might end in revelations. So he stepped ashore and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4333"></td>
        <td id="LC4333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered the woods.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4334"></td>
        <td id="LC4334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4335"></td>
        <td id="LC4335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He sat down and took a long rest, torturing himself meanwhile to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4336"></td>
        <td id="LC4336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awake, and then started warily down the home-stretch. The night was far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4337"></td>
        <td id="LC4337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spent. It was broad daylight before he found himself fairly abreast the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4338"></td>
        <td id="LC4338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">island bar. He rested again until the sun was well up and gilding the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4339"></td>
        <td id="LC4339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great river with its splendor, and then he plunged into the stream. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4340"></td>
        <td id="LC4340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little later he paused, dripping, upon the threshold of the camp, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4341"></td>
        <td id="LC4341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard Joe say:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4342"></td>
        <td id="LC4342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4343"></td>
        <td id="LC4343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, Tom&#39;s true-blue, Huck, and he&#39;ll come back. He won&#39;t desert. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4344"></td>
        <td id="LC4344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knows that would be a disgrace to a pirate, and Tom&#39;s too proud for that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4345"></td>
        <td id="LC4345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sort of thing. He&#39;s up to something or other. Now I wonder what?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4346"></td>
        <td id="LC4346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4347"></td>
        <td id="LC4347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, the things is ours, anyway, ain&#39;t they?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4348"></td>
        <td id="LC4348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4349"></td>
        <td id="LC4349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pretty near, but not yet, Huck. The writing says they are if he ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4350"></td>
        <td id="LC4350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back here to breakfast.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4351"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4352"></td>
        <td id="LC4352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Which he is!” exclaimed Tom, with fine dramatic effect, stepping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4353"></td>
        <td id="LC4353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grandly into camp.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4354"></td>
        <td id="LC4354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4355"></td>
        <td id="LC4355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A sumptuous breakfast of bacon and fish was shortly provided, and as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4356"></td>
        <td id="LC4356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boys set to work upon it, Tom recounted (and adorned) his adventures.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4357"></td>
        <td id="LC4357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were a vain and boastful company of heroes when the tale was done.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4358"></td>
        <td id="LC4358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Tom hid himself away in a shady nook to sleep till noon, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4359"></td>
        <td id="LC4359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other pirates got ready to fish and explore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4360"></td>
        <td id="LC4360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4361"></td>
        <td id="LC4361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4362"></td>
        <td id="LC4362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4363"></td>
        <td id="LC4363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4364"></td>
        <td id="LC4364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4365"></td>
        <td id="LC4365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4366"></td>
        <td id="LC4366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AFTER dinner all the gang turned out to hunt for turtle eggs on the bar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4367"></td>
        <td id="LC4367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They went about poking sticks into the sand, and when they found a soft</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4368"></td>
        <td id="LC4368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place they went down on their knees and dug with their hands. Sometimes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4369"></td>
        <td id="LC4369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would take fifty or sixty eggs out of one hole. They were perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4370"></td>
        <td id="LC4370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round white things a trifle smaller than an English walnut. They had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4371"></td>
        <td id="LC4371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">famous fried-egg feast that night, and another on Friday morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4372"></td>
        <td id="LC4372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4373"></td>
        <td id="LC4373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After breakfast they went whooping and prancing out on the bar, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4374"></td>
        <td id="LC4374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chased each other round and round, shedding clothes as they went, until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4375"></td>
        <td id="LC4375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were naked, and then continued the frolic far away up the shoal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4376"></td>
        <td id="LC4376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water of the bar, against the stiff current, which latter tripped their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4377"></td>
        <td id="LC4377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legs from under them from time to time and greatly increased the fun.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4378"></td>
        <td id="LC4378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now and then they stooped in a group and splashed water in each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4379"></td>
        <td id="LC4379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other&#39;s faces with their palms, gradually approaching each other, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4380"></td>
        <td id="LC4380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">averted faces to avoid the strangling sprays, and finally gripping and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4381"></td>
        <td id="LC4381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggling till the best man ducked his neighbor, and then they all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4382"></td>
        <td id="LC4382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went under in a tangle of white legs and arms and came up blowing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4383"></td>
        <td id="LC4383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sputtering, laughing, and gasping for breath at one and the same time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4384"></td>
        <td id="LC4384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4385"></td>
        <td id="LC4385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they were well exhausted, they would run out and sprawl on the dry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4386"></td>
        <td id="LC4386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hot sand, and lie there and cover themselves up with it, and by and by</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4387"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4389"></td>
        <td id="LC4389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flesh-colored “tights” very fairly; so they drew a ring in the sand and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4390"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4457"></td>
        <td id="LC4457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe&#39;s preparations so wistfully, and keeping up such an ominous silence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4458"></td>
        <td id="LC4458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently, without a parting word, Joe began to wade off toward the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4459"></td>
        <td id="LC4459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Illinois shore. Tom&#39;s heart began to sink. He glanced at Huck. Huck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4460"></td>
        <td id="LC4460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not bear the look, and dropped his eyes. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4461"></td>
        <td id="LC4461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4462"></td>
        <td id="LC4462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I want to go, too, Tom. It was getting so lonesome anyway, and now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4463"></td>
        <td id="LC4463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it&#39;ll be worse. Let&#39;s us go, too, Tom.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4464"></td>
        <td id="LC4464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4465"></td>
        <td id="LC4465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I won&#39;t! You can all go, if you want to. I mean to stay.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4466"></td>
        <td id="LC4466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4467"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4468"></td>
        <td id="LC4468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4469"></td>
        <td id="LC4469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, go &#39;long--who&#39;s hendering you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4470"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4471"></td>
        <td id="LC4471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck began to pick up his scattered clothes. He said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4472"></td>
        <td id="LC4472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4473"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4474"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4477"></td>
        <td id="LC4477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4478"></td>
        <td id="LC4478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck started sorrowfully away, and Tom stood looking after him, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4479"></td>
        <td id="LC4479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong desire tugging at his heart to yield his pride and go along</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4480"></td>
        <td id="LC4480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too. He hoped the boys would stop, but they still waded slowly on. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4481"></td>
        <td id="LC4481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suddenly dawned on Tom that it was become very lonely and still. He made</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4482"></td>

        <td id="LC4483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yelling:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4487"></td>
        <td id="LC4487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They presently stopped and turned around. When he got to where they</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC4496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The lads came gayly back and went at their sports again with a will,</td>

        <td id="L4551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4551"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4552"></td>

        <td id="L4553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4553"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4554"></td>
        <td id="LC4554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very good.&#39; And I&#39;ll say, &#39;Oh, that&#39;s all right, if it&#39;s _strong_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4555"></td>
        <td id="LC4555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough.&#39; And then you&#39;ll out with the pipes, and we&#39;ll light up just as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4556"></td>
        <td id="LC4556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ca&#39;m, and then just see &#39;em look!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4557"></td>
        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“By jings, that&#39;ll be gay, Tom! I wish it was _now_!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>
        <td id="LC4559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4560"></td>
        <td id="LC4560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“So do I! And when we tell &#39;em we learned when we was off pirating,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4561"></td>
        <td id="LC4561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">won&#39;t they wish they&#39;d been along?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4562"></td>
        <td id="LC4562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4563"></td>
        <td id="LC4563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, I reckon not! I&#39;ll just _bet_ they will!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4564"></td>
        <td id="LC4564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4565"></td>
        <td id="LC4565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So the talk ran on. But presently it began to flag a trifle, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>
        <td id="LC4566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grow disjointed. The silences widened; the expectoration marvellously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4567"></td>
        <td id="LC4567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">increased. Every pore inside the boys&#39; cheeks became a spouting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4568"></td>
        <td id="LC4568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fountain; they could scarcely bail out the cellars under their tongues</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4569"></td>
        <td id="LC4569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fast enough to prevent an inundation; little overflowings down their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4570"></td>
        <td id="LC4570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throats occurred in spite of all they could do, and sudden retchings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4571"></td>
        <td id="LC4571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">followed every time. Both boys were looking very pale and miserable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4572"></td>
        <td id="LC4572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now. Joe&#39;s pipe dropped from his nerveless fingers. Tom&#39;s followed. Both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4573"></td>
        <td id="LC4573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fountains were going furiously and both pumps bailing with might and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4574"></td>
        <td id="LC4574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">main. Joe said feebly:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4575"></td>
        <td id="LC4575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4576"></td>
        <td id="LC4576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;ve lost my knife. I reckon I better go and find it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4577"></td>
        <td id="LC4577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4578"></td>
        <td id="LC4578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom said, with quivering lips and halting utterance:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4579"></td>
        <td id="LC4579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4580"></td>
        <td id="LC4580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;ll help you. You go over that way and I&#39;ll hunt around by the spring.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4581"></td>
        <td id="LC4581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, you needn&#39;t come, Huck--we can find it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4582"></td>
        <td id="LC4582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4583"></td>
        <td id="LC4583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So Huck sat down again, and waited an hour. Then he found it lonesome,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4584"></td>
        <td id="LC4584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and went to find his comrades. They were wide apart in the woods, both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4587"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4588"></td>
        <td id="LC4588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were not talkative at supper that night. They had a humble look,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4589"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4590"></td>
        <td id="LC4590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">theirs, they said no, they were not feeling very well--something they ate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4591"></td>
        <td id="LC4591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at dinner had disagreed with them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4592"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4593"></td>
        <td id="LC4593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">About midnight Joe awoke, and called the boys. There was a brooding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4594"></td>
        <td id="LC4594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oppressiveness in the air that seemed to bode something. The boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4595"></td>
        <td id="LC4595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">huddled themselves together and sought the friendly companionship of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4596"></td>
        <td id="LC4596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the fire, though the dull dead heat of the breathless atmosphere was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4597"></td>
        <td id="LC4597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stifling. They sat still, intent and waiting. The solemn hush continued.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4598"></td>
        <td id="LC4598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Beyond the light of the fire everything was swallowed up in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4599"></td>
        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blackness of darkness. Presently there came a quivering glow that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>
        <td id="LC4600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vaguely revealed the foliage for a moment and then vanished. By and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4601"></td>
        <td id="LC4601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another came, a little stronger. Then another. Then a faint moan came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4602"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4603"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4604"></td>
        <td id="LC4604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Night had gone by. There was a pause. Now a weird flash turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4605"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4606"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>
        <td id="LC4607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">startled faces, too. A deep peal of thunder went rolling and tumbling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down the heavens and lost itself in sullen rumblings in the distance. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweep of chilly air passed by, rustling all the leaves and snowing the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flaky ashes broadcast about the fire. Another fierce glare lit up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forest and an instant crash followed that seemed to rend the treetops</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right over the boys&#39; heads. They clung together in terror, in the thick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom that followed. A few big raindrops fell pattering upon the leaves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>
        <td id="LC4614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4615"></td>
        <td id="LC4615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Quick! boys, go for the tent!” exclaimed Tom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>
        <td id="LC4616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4617"></td>
        <td id="LC4617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They sprang away, stumbling over roots and among vines in the dark, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4618"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4619"></td>
        <td id="LC4619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the trees, making everything sing as it went. One blinding flash after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4620"></td>
        <td id="LC4620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another came, and peal on peal of deafening thunder. And now a drenching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4621"></td>
        <td id="LC4621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rain poured down and the rising hurricane drove it in sheets along the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4622"></td>
        <td id="LC4622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground. The boys cried out to each other, but the roaring wind and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4623"></td>
        <td id="LC4623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">booming thunderblasts drowned their voices utterly. However, one by one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4624"></td>
        <td id="LC4624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they straggled in at last and took shelter under the tent, cold, scared,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4625"></td>
        <td id="LC4625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and streaming with water; but to have company in misery seemed something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4626"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4627"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4628"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4629"></td>
        <td id="LC4629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fastenings and went winging away on the blast. The boys seized each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4630"></td>
        <td id="LC4630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others&#39; hands and fled, with many tumblings and bruises, to the shelter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4631"></td>
        <td id="LC4631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a great oak that stood upon the riverbank. Now the battle was at its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4632"></td>
        <td id="LC4632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest. Under the ceaseless conflagration of lightning that flamed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4633"></td>
        <td id="LC4633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the skies, everything below stood out in cleancut and shadowless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4635"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4636"></td>
        <td id="LC4636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other side, glimpsed through the drifting cloudrack and the slanting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4637"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4638"></td>
        <td id="LC4638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fell crashing through the younger growth; and the unflagging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4639"></td>
        <td id="LC4639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thunderpeals came now in ear-splitting explosive bursts, keen and sharp,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4640"></td>
        <td id="LC4640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unspeakably appalling. The storm culminated in one matchless effort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4641"></td>
        <td id="LC4641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that seemed likely to tear the island to pieces, burn it up, drown it to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4642"></td>
        <td id="LC4642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the treetops, blow it away, and deafen every creature in it, all at one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4643"></td>
        <td id="LC4643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the same moment. It was a wild night for homeless young heads to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4644"></td>
        <td id="LC4644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out in.</td>

        <td id="L4648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4648"></td>
        <td id="LC4648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boys went back to camp, a good deal awed; but they found there was still</td>

        <td id="LC4675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheer. While it lasted, he got them interested in a new device. This was</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4677"></td>

        <td id="L4710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4710"></td>
        <td id="LC4710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4711"></td>
