      <tr>
        <td id="L4712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4712"></td>
        <td id="LC4712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BUT there was no hilarity in the little town that same tranquil Saturday</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4713"></td>
        <td id="LC4713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afternoon. The Harpers, and Aunt Polly&#39;s family, were being put into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4714"></td>
        <td id="LC4714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mourning, with great grief and many tears. An unusual quiet possessed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4715"></td>
        <td id="LC4715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the village, although it was ordinarily quiet enough, in all conscience.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4716"></td>
        <td id="LC4716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The villagers conducted their concerns with an absent air, and talked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4717"></td>
        <td id="LC4717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little; but they sighed often. The Saturday holiday seemed a burden to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4718"></td>
        <td id="LC4718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the children. They had no heart in their sports, and gradually gave them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4719"></td>
        <td id="LC4719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4720"></td>
        <td id="LC4720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4721"></td>
        <td id="LC4721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the afternoon Becky Thatcher found herself moping about the deserted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4722"></td>
        <td id="LC4722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">schoolhouse yard, and feeling very melancholy. But she found nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4723"></td>
        <td id="LC4723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there to comfort her. She soliloquized:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4724"></td>
        <td id="LC4724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4725"></td>
        <td id="LC4725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, if I only had a brass andiron-knob again! But I haven&#39;t got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4726"></td>
        <td id="LC4726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything now to remember him by.” And she choked back a little sob.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4727"></td>
        <td id="LC4727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4728"></td>
        <td id="LC4728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently she stopped, and said to herself:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4729"></td>
        <td id="LC4729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4730"></td>
        <td id="LC4730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was right here. Oh, if it was to do over again, I wouldn&#39;t say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4731"></td>
        <td id="LC4731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that--I wouldn&#39;t say it for the whole world. But he&#39;s gone now; I&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4732"></td>
        <td id="LC4732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never, never, never see him any more.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4733"></td>
        <td id="LC4733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4734"></td>
        <td id="LC4734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This thought broke her down, and she wandered away, with tears rolling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4735"></td>
        <td id="LC4735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down her cheeks. Then quite a group of boys and girls--playmates of Tom&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>
        <td id="LC4736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Joe&#39;s--came by, and stood looking over the paling fence and talking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4737"></td>
        <td id="LC4737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in reverent tones of how Tom did so-and-so the last time they saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4738"></td>
        <td id="LC4738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, and how Joe said this and that small trifle (pregnant with awful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4739"></td>
        <td id="LC4739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prophecy, as they could easily see now!)--and each speaker pointed out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4740"></td>
        <td id="LC4740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the exact spot where the lost lads stood at the time, and then added</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4741"></td>
        <td id="LC4741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something like “and I was a-standing just so--just as I am now, and as if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4742"></td>
        <td id="LC4742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you was him--I was as close as that--and he smiled, just this way--and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4743"></td>
        <td id="LC4743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something seemed to go all over me, like--awful, you know--and I never</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4744"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4745"></td>
        <td id="LC4745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4746"></td>
        <td id="LC4746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then there was a dispute about who saw the dead boys last in life, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>

        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>

        <td id="LC4750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lucky parties took upon themselves a sort of sacred importance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4751"></td>

        <td id="L4752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4752"></td>
        <td id="LC4752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no other grandeur to offer, said with tolerably manifest pride in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4753"></td>
        <td id="LC4753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remembrance:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4754"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4755"></td>
        <td id="LC4755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, Tom Sawyer he licked me once.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4756"></td>
        <td id="LC4756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L4762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4762"></td>

        <td id="L4763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4763"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4818"></td>
        <td id="LC4818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while it shook the rafters Tom Sawyer the Pirate looked around upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4819"></td>
        <td id="LC4819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">envying juveniles about him and confessed in his heart that this was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4820"></td>
        <td id="LC4820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proudest moment of his life.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4821"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4822"></td>
        <td id="LC4822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the “sold” congregation trooped out they said they would almost be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4823"></td>
        <td id="LC4823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">willing to be made ridiculous again to hear Old Hundred sung like that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4824"></td>
        <td id="LC4824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4825"></td>
        <td id="LC4825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4826"></td>
        <td id="LC4826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom got more cuffs and kisses that day--according to Aunt Polly&#39;s varying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4827"></td>
        <td id="LC4827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moods--than he had earned before in a year; and he hardly knew which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4828"></td>
        <td id="LC4828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressed the most gratefulness to God and affection for himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4829"></td>
        <td id="LC4829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4830"></td>
        <td id="LC4830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4831"></td>
        <td id="LC4831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4832"></td>
        <td id="LC4832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4833"></td>
        <td id="LC4833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4834"></td>
        <td id="LC4834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4835"></td>
        <td id="LC4835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THAT was Tom&#39;s great secret--the scheme to return home with his brother</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4836"></td>
        <td id="LC4836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pirates and attend their own funerals. They had paddled over to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4837"></td>
        <td id="LC4837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Missouri shore on a log, at dusk on Saturday, landing five or six miles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4838"></td>
        <td id="LC4838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">below the village; they had slept in the woods at the edge of the town</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4839"></td>
        <td id="LC4839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till nearly daylight, and had then crept through back lanes and alleys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4840"></td>
        <td id="LC4840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and finished their sleep in the gallery of the church among a chaos of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4841"></td>
        <td id="LC4841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invalided benches.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4842"></td>
        <td id="LC4842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4843"></td>
        <td id="LC4843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At breakfast, Monday morning, Aunt Polly and Mary were very loving to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4844"></td>
        <td id="LC4844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom, and very attentive to his wants. There was an unusual amount of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4845"></td>
        <td id="LC4845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk. In the course of it Aunt Polly said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4846"></td>
        <td id="LC4846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4847"></td>
        <td id="LC4847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I don&#39;t say it wasn&#39;t a fine joke, Tom, to keep everybody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4848"></td>
        <td id="LC4848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffering &#39;most a week so you boys had a good time, but it is a pity you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4849"></td>
        <td id="LC4849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could be so hard-hearted as to let me suffer so. If you could come over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4850"></td>
        <td id="LC4850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on a log to go to your funeral, you could have come over and give me a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4851"></td>
        <td id="LC4851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hint some way that you warn&#39;t dead, but only run off.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4852"></td>
        <td id="LC4852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4853"></td>
        <td id="LC4853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, you could have done that, Tom,” said Mary; “and I believe you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4854"></td>
        <td id="LC4854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would if you had thought of it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4855"></td>
        <td id="LC4855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4856"></td>
        <td id="LC4856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Would you, Tom?” said Aunt Polly, her face lighting wistfully. “Say,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4857"></td>
        <td id="LC4857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now, would you, if you&#39;d thought of it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4858"></td>
        <td id="LC4858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4859"></td>
        <td id="LC4859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I--well, I don&#39;t know. &#39;Twould &#39;a&#39; spoiled everything.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4860"></td>
        <td id="LC4860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4861"></td>
        <td id="LC4861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom, I hoped you loved me that much,” said Aunt Polly, with a grieved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4862"></td>
        <td id="LC4862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tone that discomforted the boy. “It would have been something if you&#39;d</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4863"></td>
        <td id="LC4863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cared enough to _think_ of it, even if you didn&#39;t _do_ it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4864"></td>
        <td id="LC4864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4865"></td>
        <td id="LC4865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, auntie, that ain&#39;t any harm,” pleaded Mary; “it&#39;s only Tom&#39;s giddy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4866"></td>
        <td id="LC4866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way--he is always in such a rush that he never thinks of anything.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4867"></td>
        <td id="LC4867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4868"></td>
        <td id="LC4868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“More&#39;s the pity. Sid would have thought. And Sid would have come and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4869"></td>
        <td id="LC4869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_done_ it, too. Tom, you&#39;ll look back, some day, when it&#39;s too late,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4870"></td>
        <td id="LC4870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and wish you&#39;d cared a little more for me when it would have cost you so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4871"></td>
        <td id="LC4871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4872"></td>
        <td id="LC4872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4873"></td>
        <td id="LC4873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, auntie, you know I do care for you,” said Tom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4874"></td>
        <td id="LC4874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4875"></td>
        <td id="LC4875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;d know it better if you acted more like it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4876"></td>
        <td id="LC4876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4877"></td>
        <td id="LC4877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I wish now I&#39;d thought,” said Tom, with a repentant tone; “but I dreamt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4878"></td>
        <td id="LC4878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about you, anyway. That&#39;s something, ain&#39;t it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4879"></td>
        <td id="LC4879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4880"></td>
        <td id="LC4880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It ain&#39;t much--a cat does that much--but it&#39;s better than nothing. What</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4881"></td>
        <td id="LC4881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did you dream?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4882"></td>
        <td id="LC4882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4883"></td>
        <td id="LC4883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, Wednesday night I dreamt that you was sitting over there by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4884"></td>
        <td id="LC4884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed, and Sid was sitting by the woodbox, and Mary next to him.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4885"></td>
        <td id="LC4885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4886"></td>
        <td id="LC4886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, so we did. So we always do. I&#39;m glad your dreams could take even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4887"></td>
        <td id="LC4887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that much trouble about us.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4888"></td>
        <td id="LC4888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4889"></td>
        <td id="LC4889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And I dreamt that Joe Harper&#39;s mother was here.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4890"></td>
        <td id="LC4890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4891"></td>
        <td id="LC4891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, she was here! Did you dream any more?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4892"></td>
        <td id="LC4892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4893"></td>
        <td id="LC4893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, lots. But it&#39;s so dim, now.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4894"></td>
        <td id="LC4894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4895"></td>
        <td id="LC4895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, try to recollect--can&#39;t you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4896"></td>
        <td id="LC4896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4897"></td>
        <td id="LC4897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Somehow it seems to me that the wind--the wind blowed the--the--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4898"></td>
        <td id="LC4898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4899"></td>
        <td id="LC4899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Try harder, Tom! The wind did blow something. Come!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4900"></td>
        <td id="LC4900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4901"></td>
        <td id="LC4901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom pressed his fingers on his forehead an anxious minute, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4902"></td>
        <td id="LC4902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4903"></td>
        <td id="LC4903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4904"></td>
        <td id="LC4904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;ve got it now! I&#39;ve got it now! It blowed the candle!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4905"></td>
        <td id="LC4905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4906"></td>
        <td id="LC4906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Mercy on us! Go on, Tom--go on!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4907"></td>
        <td id="LC4907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4908"></td>
        <td id="LC4908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And it seems to me that you said, &#39;Why, I believe that that door--&#39;”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4909"></td>
        <td id="LC4909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4910"></td>
        <td id="LC4910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Go _on_, Tom!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4911"></td>
        <td id="LC4911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4912"></td>
        <td id="LC4912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Just let me study a moment--just a moment. Oh, yes--you said you believed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4913"></td>
        <td id="LC4913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door was open.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4914"></td>
        <td id="LC4914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4915"></td>
        <td id="LC4915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As I&#39;m sitting here, I did! Didn&#39;t I, Mary! Go on!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4916"></td>
        <td id="LC4916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4917"></td>
        <td id="LC4917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And then--and then--well I won&#39;t be certain, but it seems like as if you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4918"></td>
        <td id="LC4918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made Sid go and--and--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4919"></td>
        <td id="LC4919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4920"></td>
        <td id="LC4920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well? Well? What did I make him do, Tom? What did I make him do?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4921"></td>

        <td id="LC5106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-satisfaction. And he kept drifting about to find Becky and lacerate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5107"></td>
        <td id="LC5107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her with the performance. At last he spied her, but there was a sudden</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5108"></td>
        <td id="LC5108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falling of his mercury. She was sitting cosily on a little bench behind</td>

        <td id="L5112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5112"></td>

        <td id="LC5187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM arrived at home in a dreary mood, and the first thing his aunt said</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5189"></td>
        <td id="LC5189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">market:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5193"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5194"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5195"></td>
        <td id="LC5195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, you&#39;ve done enough. Here I go over to Sereny Harper, like an old</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5196"></td>
        <td id="LC5196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">softy, expecting I&#39;m going to make her believe all that rubbage about</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5290"></td>
        <td id="LC5290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5291"></td>
        <td id="LC5291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5292"></td>
        <td id="LC5292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5293"></td>
        <td id="LC5293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5294"></td>
        <td id="LC5294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5295"></td>
        <td id="LC5295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THERE was something about Aunt Polly&#39;s manner, when she kissed Tom, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5296"></td>
        <td id="LC5296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swept away his low spirits and made him lighthearted and happy again. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5297"></td>
        <td id="LC5297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started to school and had the luck of coming upon Becky Thatcher at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5298"></td>
        <td id="LC5298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head of Meadow Lane. His mood always determined his manner. Without a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5299"></td>
        <td id="LC5299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment&#39;s hesitation he ran to her and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5300"></td>
        <td id="LC5300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5301"></td>
        <td id="LC5301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I acted mighty mean today, Becky, and I&#39;m so sorry. I won&#39;t ever, ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5302"></td>
        <td id="LC5302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do that way again, as long as ever I live--please make up, won&#39;t you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5303"></td>
        <td id="LC5303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5304"></td>
        <td id="LC5304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The girl stopped and looked him scornfully in the face:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5305"></td>
        <td id="LC5305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5306"></td>
        <td id="LC5306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;ll thank you to keep yourself _to_ yourself, Mr. Thomas Sawyer. I&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5307"></td>
        <td id="LC5307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never speak to you again.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5308"></td>
        <td id="LC5308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5309"></td>
        <td id="LC5309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She tossed her head and passed on. Tom was so stunned that he had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5310"></td>
        <td id="LC5310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even presence of mind enough to say “Who cares, Miss Smarty?” until the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5311"></td>
        <td id="LC5311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right time to say it had gone by. So he said nothing. But he was in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5312"></td>
        <td id="LC5312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fine rage, nevertheless. He moped into the schoolyard wishing she were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5313"></td>
        <td id="LC5313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a boy, and imagining how he would trounce her if she were. He presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5314"></td>
        <td id="LC5314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encountered her and delivered a stinging remark as he passed. She hurled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5315"></td>
        <td id="LC5315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one in return, and the angry breach was complete. It seemed to Becky, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5316"></td>
        <td id="LC5316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her hot resentment, that she could hardly wait for school to “take in,”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5317"></td>
        <td id="LC5317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> she was so impatient to see Tom flogged for the injured spelling-book.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5318"></td>
        <td id="LC5318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If she had had any lingering notion of exposing Alfred Temple, Tom&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5319"></td>
        <td id="LC5319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offensive fling had driven it entirely away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5320"></td>
        <td id="LC5320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5321"></td>
        <td id="LC5321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Poor girl, she did not know how fast she was nearing trouble herself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5322"></td>
        <td id="LC5322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The master, Mr. Dobbins, had reached middle age with an unsatisfied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5323"></td>
        <td id="LC5323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ambition. The darling of his desires was, to be a doctor, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5324"></td>
        <td id="LC5324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poverty had decreed that he should be nothing higher than a village</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5325"></td>
        <td id="LC5325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">schoolmaster. Every day he took a mysterious book out of his desk and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5326"></td>
        <td id="LC5326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absorbed himself in it at times when no classes were reciting. He kept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5327"></td>
        <td id="LC5327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that book under lock and key. There was not an urchin in school but was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5328"></td>
        <td id="LC5328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perishing to have a glimpse of it, but the chance never came. Every boy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5329"></td>
        <td id="LC5329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and girl had a theory about the nature of that book; but no two theories</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5330"></td>
        <td id="LC5330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were alike, and there was no way of getting at the facts in the case.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5331"></td>
        <td id="LC5331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, as Becky was passing by the desk, which stood near the door, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5332"></td>
        <td id="LC5332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noticed that the key was in the lock! It was a precious moment. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5333"></td>
        <td id="LC5333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glanced around; found herself alone, and the next instant she had the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5334"></td>
        <td id="LC5334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">book in her hands. The titlepage--Professor Somebody&#39;s _Anatomy_--carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5335"></td>
        <td id="LC5335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no information to her mind; so she began to turn the leaves. She came at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5336"></td>
        <td id="LC5336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once upon a handsomely engraved and colored frontispiece--a human figure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5337"></td>
        <td id="LC5337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stark naked. At that moment a shadow fell on the page and Tom Sawyer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5338"></td>
        <td id="LC5338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stepped in at the door and caught a glimpse of the picture. Becky</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5339"></td>
        <td id="LC5339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snatched at the book to close it, and had the hard luck to tear the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5340"></td>
        <td id="LC5340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pictured page half down the middle. She thrust the volume into the desk,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5341"></td>
        <td id="LC5341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned the key, and burst out crying with shame and vexation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5342"></td>
        <td id="LC5342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5343"></td>
        <td id="LC5343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom Sawyer, you are just as mean as you can be, to sneak up on a person</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5344"></td>
        <td id="LC5344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and look at what they&#39;re looking at.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5345"></td>
        <td id="LC5345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5346"></td>
        <td id="LC5346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How could I know you was looking at anything?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5347"></td>
        <td id="LC5347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5348"></td>
        <td id="LC5348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You ought to be ashamed of yourself, Tom Sawyer; you know you&#39;re</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5349"></td>
        <td id="LC5349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to tell on me, and oh, what shall I do, what shall I do! I&#39;ll be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5350"></td>
        <td id="LC5350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whipped, and I never was whipped in school.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5351"></td>
        <td id="LC5351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5352"></td>
        <td id="LC5352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then she stamped her little foot and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5353"></td>
        <td id="LC5353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5354"></td>
        <td id="LC5354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_Be_ so mean if you want to! I know something that&#39;s going to happen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5355"></td>
        <td id="LC5355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You just wait and you&#39;ll see! Hateful, hateful, hateful!”--and she flung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5356"></td>
        <td id="LC5356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the house with a new explosion of crying.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5357"></td>
        <td id="LC5357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5358"></td>
        <td id="LC5358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom stood still, rather flustered by this onslaught. Presently he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5359"></td>
        <td id="LC5359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to himself:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5360"></td>
        <td id="LC5360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5361"></td>
        <td id="LC5361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What a curious kind of a fool a girl is! Never been licked in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5362"></td>
        <td id="LC5362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">school! Shucks! What&#39;s a licking! That&#39;s just like a girl--they&#39;re so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5363"></td>
        <td id="LC5363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thin-skinned and chicken-hearted. Well, of course I ain&#39;t going to tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5364"></td>
        <td id="LC5364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old Dobbins on this little fool, because there&#39;s other ways of getting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5365"></td>
        <td id="LC5365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even on her, that ain&#39;t so mean; but what of it? Old Dobbins will ask</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5366"></td>
        <td id="LC5366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who it was tore his book. Nobody&#39;ll answer. Then he&#39;ll do just the way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5367"></td>
        <td id="LC5367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he always does--ask first one and then t&#39;other, and when he comes to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5368"></td>
        <td id="LC5368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right girl he&#39;ll know it, without any telling. Girls&#39; faces always tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5369"></td>
        <td id="LC5369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on them. They ain&#39;t got any backbone. She&#39;ll get licked. Well, it&#39;s a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5370"></td>
        <td id="LC5370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind of a tight place for Becky Thatcher, because there ain&#39;t any way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5371"></td>
        <td id="LC5371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of it.” Tom conned the thing a moment longer, and then added: “All</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5372"></td>
        <td id="LC5372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right, though; she&#39;d like to see me in just such a fix--let her sweat it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5373"></td>
        <td id="LC5373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5374"></td>
        <td id="LC5374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5375"></td>
        <td id="LC5375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom joined the mob of skylarking scholars outside. In a few moments the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5376"></td>
        <td id="LC5376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master arrived and school “took in.” Tom did not feel a strong interest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5377"></td>
        <td id="LC5377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his studies. Every time he stole a glance at the girls&#39; side of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5378"></td>
        <td id="LC5378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room Becky&#39;s face troubled him. Considering all things, he did not want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5379"></td>
        <td id="LC5379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to pity her, and yet it was all he could do to help it. He could get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5380"></td>
        <td id="LC5380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up no exultation that was really worthy the name. Presently the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5381"></td>

        <td id="L5384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5384"></td>
        <td id="LC5384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not expect that Tom could get out of his trouble by denying that he</td>

        <td id="LC5473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5474"></td>
        <td id="LC5474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5475"></td>
        <td id="LC5475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5476"></td>
        <td id="LC5476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5477"></td>
        <td id="LC5477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VACATION was approaching. The schoolmaster, always severe, grew severer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5478"></td>
        <td id="LC5478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and more exacting than ever, for he wanted the school to make a good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5479"></td>
        <td id="LC5479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">showing on “Examination” day. His rod and his ferule were seldom idle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5480"></td>
        <td id="LC5480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now--at least among the smaller pupils. Only the biggest boys, and young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5481"></td>
        <td id="LC5481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladies of eighteen and twenty, escaped lashing. Mr. Dobbins&#39; lashings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5482"></td>
        <td id="LC5482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were very vigorous ones, too; for although he carried, under his wig, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5483"></td>
        <td id="LC5483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfectly bald and shiny head, he had only reached middle age, and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5484"></td>
        <td id="LC5484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was no sign of feebleness in his muscle. As the great day approached,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5485"></td>
        <td id="LC5485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the tyranny that was in him came to the surface; he seemed to take a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5486"></td>
        <td id="LC5486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vindictive pleasure in punishing the least shortcomings. The consequence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5487"></td>
        <td id="LC5487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, that the smaller boys spent their days in terror and suffering and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5488"></td>
        <td id="LC5488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their nights in plotting revenge. They threw away no opportunity to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5489"></td>
        <td id="LC5489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the master a mischief. But he kept ahead all the time. The retribution</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5490"></td>
        <td id="LC5490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that followed every vengeful success was so sweeping and majestic that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5491"></td>
        <td id="LC5491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the boys always retired from the field badly worsted. At last they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5492"></td>
        <td id="LC5492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conspired together and hit upon a plan that promised a dazzling victory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5493"></td>
        <td id="LC5493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They swore in the signpainter&#39;s boy, told him the scheme, and asked his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5494"></td>
        <td id="LC5494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">help. He had his own reasons for being delighted, for the master boarded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5495"></td>
        <td id="LC5495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his father&#39;s family and had given the boy ample cause to hate him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5496"></td>
        <td id="LC5496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The master&#39;s wife would go on a visit to the country in a few days, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5497"></td>
        <td id="LC5497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there would be nothing to interfere with the plan; the master always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5498"></td>
        <td id="LC5498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepared himself for great occasions by getting pretty well fuddled, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5499"></td>
        <td id="LC5499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the signpainter&#39;s boy said that when the dominie had reached the proper</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5500"></td>
        <td id="LC5500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condition on Examination Evening he would “manage the thing” while he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5501"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5503"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5504"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="L5532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5532"></td>
        <td id="LC5532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom Sawyer stepped forward with conceited confidence and soared into</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5558"></td>
        <td id="LC5558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">melancholy; another was a wasteful and opulent gush of “fine language”;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5559"></td>
        <td id="LC5559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another was a tendency to lug in by the ears particularly prized words</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5560"></td>
        <td id="LC5560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and phrases until they were worn entirely out; and a peculiarity that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5561"></td>
        <td id="LC5561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conspicuously marked and marred them was the inveterate and intolerable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5562"></td>
        <td id="LC5562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sermon that wagged its crippled tail at the end of each and every one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5563"></td>
        <td id="LC5563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them. No matter what the subject might be, a brainracking effort was</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5747"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5840"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5841"></td>
        <td id="LC5841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mum. But let&#39;s swear again, anyway. It&#39;s more surer.”</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L5926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5926"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5929"></td>
        <td id="LC5929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the packed audience. After a long wait the jury filed in and took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5930"></td>
        <td id="LC5930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their places; shortly afterward, Potter, pale and haggard, timid and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6025"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6026"></td>
        <td id="LC6026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Where?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6027"></td>
        <td id="LC6027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L6028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6028"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L6030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6030"></td>
        <td id="LC6030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Injun Joe gave a barely perceptible start.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6031"></td>

        <td id="LC6038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you.”</td>

        <td id="L6089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6089"></td>

        <td id="LC6102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Rewards had been offered, the country had been scoured, but no Injun</td>

        <td id="L6104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6104"></td>

        <td id="LC6116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6117"></td>
        <td id="LC6117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6118"></td>
        <td id="LC6118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THERE comes a time in every rightly-constructed boy&#39;s life when he has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6119"></td>
        <td id="LC6119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a raging desire to go somewhere and dig for hidden treasure. This desire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6120"></td>
        <td id="LC6120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suddenly came upon Tom one day. He sallied out to find Joe Harper,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6121"></td>
        <td id="LC6121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but failed of success. Next he sought Ben Rogers; he had gone fishing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6122"></td>
        <td id="LC6122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently he stumbled upon Huck Finn the Red-Handed. Huck would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6123"></td>
        <td id="LC6123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer. Tom took him to a private place and opened the matter to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6124"></td>
        <td id="LC6124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confidentially. Huck was willing. Huck was always willing to take a hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6125"></td>
        <td id="LC6125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in any enterprise that offered entertainment and required no capital,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6127"></td>

        <td id="LC6128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I reckon maybe we&#39;ll tackle the old tree that&#39;s over yonder on Cardiff</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6311"></td>
        <td id="LC6311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hill back of the widow&#39;s.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6312"></td>

        <td id="LC6400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom considered awhile; and then said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6401"></td>
        <td id="LC6401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="LC6402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The ha&#39;nted house. That&#39;s it!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6403"></td>
        <td id="LC6403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6404"></td>
        <td id="LC6404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Blame it, I don&#39;t like ha&#39;nted houses, Tom. Why, they&#39;re a dern sight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6405"></td>
        <td id="LC6405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worse&#39;n dead people. Dead people might talk, maybe, but they don&#39;t come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6406"></td>
        <td id="LC6406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sliding around in a shroud, when you ain&#39;t noticing, and peep over your</td>

        <td id="L6408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6408"></td>
        <td id="LC6408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">couldn&#39;t stand such a thing as that, Tom--nobody could.”</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6480"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC6483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, he was one of the greatest men that was ever in England--and the</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6487"></td>
        <td id="LC6487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6488"></td>
        <td id="LC6488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Only sheriffs and bishops and rich people and kings, and such like. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6489"></td>
        <td id="LC6489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he never bothered the poor. He loved &#39;em. He always divided up with &#39;em</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6490"></td>
        <td id="LC6490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfectly square.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6491"></td>
        <td id="LC6491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6492"></td>
        <td id="LC6492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, he must &#39;a&#39; been a brick.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6493"></td>
        <td id="LC6493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6494"></td>
        <td id="LC6494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I bet you he was, Huck. Oh, he was the noblest man that ever was.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6495"></td>
        <td id="LC6495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They ain&#39;t any such men now, I can tell you. He could lick any man in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6496"></td>
        <td id="LC6496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England, with one hand tied behind him; and he could take his yew bow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6497"></td>
        <td id="LC6497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and plug a ten-cent piece every time, a mile and a half.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>

        <td id="L6499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6499"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L6501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6501"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6502"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6503"></td>
        <td id="LC6503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">play Robin Hood--it&#39;s nobby fun. I&#39;ll learn you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6504"></td>
        <td id="LC6504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6586"></td>
        <td id="LC6586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Twon&#39;t ever be known that we tried, anyway, long as we didn&#39;t succeed.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6587"></td>
