        <td id="L6589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6589"></td>
        <td id="LC6589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would suspicion us that saw us.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6590"></td>
        <td id="LC6590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6591"></td>
        <td id="LC6591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know that. But there warn&#39;t any other place as handy after that fool</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6592"></td>
        <td id="LC6592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a job. I want to quit this shanty. I wanted to yesterday, only it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6593"></td>
        <td id="LC6593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warn&#39;t any use trying to stir out of here, with those infernal boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6594"></td>
        <td id="LC6594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">playing over there on the hill right in full view.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6595"></td>
        <td id="LC6595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6596"></td>
        <td id="LC6596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Those infernal boys” quaked again under the inspiration of this remark,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6597"></td>
        <td id="LC6597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and thought how lucky it was that they had remembered it was Friday and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6598"></td>
        <td id="LC6598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concluded to wait a day. They wished in their hearts they had waited a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6599"></td>
        <td id="LC6599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">year.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6600"></td>
        <td id="LC6600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6601"></td>
        <td id="LC6601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The two men got out some food and made a luncheon. After a long and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6602"></td>
        <td id="LC6602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thoughtful silence, Injun Joe said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6603"></td>
        <td id="LC6603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6604"></td>
        <td id="LC6604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Look here, lad--you go back up the river where you belong. Wait there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6605"></td>
        <td id="LC6605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till you hear from me. I&#39;ll take the chances on dropping into this town</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6606"></td>
        <td id="LC6606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just once more, for a look. We&#39;ll do that &#39;dangerous&#39; job after I&#39;ve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6607"></td>
        <td id="LC6607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spied around a little and think things look well for it. Then for Texas!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6608"></td>
        <td id="LC6608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We&#39;ll leg it together!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6609"></td>
        <td id="LC6609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6610"></td>
        <td id="LC6610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was satisfactory. Both men presently fell to yawning, and Injun Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6611"></td>
        <td id="LC6611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6612"></td>
        <td id="LC6612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6613"></td>
        <td id="LC6613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;m dead for sleep! It&#39;s your turn to watch.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6614"></td>
        <td id="LC6614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6615"></td>
        <td id="LC6615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He curled down in the weeds and soon began to snore. His comrade stirred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6616"></td>
        <td id="LC6616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him once or twice and he became quiet. Presently the watcher began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6617"></td>
        <td id="LC6617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nod; his head drooped lower and lower, both men began to snore now.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6618"></td>
        <td id="LC6618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6619"></td>
        <td id="LC6619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys drew a long, grateful breath. Tom whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6620"></td>
        <td id="LC6620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6621"></td>
        <td id="LC6621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now&#39;s our chance--come!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6622"></td>
        <td id="LC6622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6623"></td>
        <td id="LC6623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6624"></td>
        <td id="LC6624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6625"></td>
        <td id="LC6625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I can&#39;t--I&#39;d die if they was to wake.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6626"></td>
        <td id="LC6626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6627"></td>
        <td id="LC6627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom urged--Huck held back. At last Tom rose slowly and softly, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6628"></td>
        <td id="LC6628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started alone. But the first step he made wrung such a hideous creak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6629"></td>
        <td id="LC6629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the crazy floor that he sank down almost dead with fright. He never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6630"></td>
        <td id="LC6630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made a second attempt. The boys lay there counting the dragging moments</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6631"></td>
        <td id="LC6631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till it seemed to them that time must be done and eternity growing gray;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6632"></td>
        <td id="LC6632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then they were grateful to note that at last the sun was setting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6633"></td>
        <td id="LC6633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6634"></td>
        <td id="LC6634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now one snore ceased. Injun Joe sat up, stared around--smiled grimly upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6635"></td>
        <td id="LC6635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his comrade, whose head was drooping upon his knees--stirred him up with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6636"></td>
        <td id="LC6636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his foot and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6637"></td>
        <td id="LC6637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6638"></td>
        <td id="LC6638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Here! _You&#39;re_ a watchman, ain&#39;t you! All right, though--nothing&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6639"></td>
        <td id="LC6639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6640"></td>
        <td id="LC6640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6641"></td>
        <td id="LC6641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My! have I been asleep?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6642"></td>
        <td id="LC6642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6643"></td>
        <td id="LC6643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, partly, partly. Nearly time for us to be moving, pard. What&#39;ll we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6644"></td>
        <td id="LC6644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do with what little swag we&#39;ve got left?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6645"></td>
        <td id="LC6645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6646"></td>
        <td id="LC6646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I don&#39;t know--leave it here as we&#39;ve always done, I reckon. No use to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6647"></td>
        <td id="LC6647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take it away till we start south. Six hundred and fifty in silver&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6648"></td>
        <td id="LC6648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something to carry.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6649"></td>
        <td id="LC6649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6650"></td>
        <td id="LC6650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well--all right--it won&#39;t matter to come here once more.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6651"></td>
        <td id="LC6651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6652"></td>
        <td id="LC6652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No--but I&#39;d say come in the night as we used to do--it&#39;s better.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6653"></td>
        <td id="LC6653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6654"></td>
        <td id="LC6654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes: but look here; it may be a good while before I get the right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6655"></td>
        <td id="LC6655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance at that job; accidents might happen; &#39;tain&#39;t in such a very good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6656"></td>
        <td id="LC6656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place; we&#39;ll just regularly bury it--and bury it deep.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6657"></td>
        <td id="LC6657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6658"></td>
        <td id="LC6658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good idea,” said the comrade, who walked across the room, knelt down,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6659"></td>
        <td id="LC6659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raised one of the rearward hearth-stones and took out a bag that jingled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6660"></td>
        <td id="LC6660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasantly. He subtracted from it twenty or thirty dollars for himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6661"></td>
        <td id="LC6661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as much for Injun Joe, and passed the bag to the latter, who was on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6662"></td>
        <td id="LC6662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his knees in the corner, now, digging with his bowie-knife.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6663"></td>
        <td id="LC6663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6664"></td>
        <td id="LC6664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys forgot all their fears, all their miseries in an instant. With</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6665"></td>
        <td id="LC6665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloating eyes they watched every movement. Luck!--the splendor of it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6666"></td>
        <td id="LC6666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond all imagination! Six hundred dollars was money enough to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6667"></td>
        <td id="LC6667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half a dozen boys rich! Here was treasure-hunting under the happiest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6668"></td>
        <td id="LC6668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">auspices--there would not be any bothersome uncertainty as to where to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6669"></td>
        <td id="LC6669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dig. They nudged each other every moment--eloquent nudges and easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6670"></td>
        <td id="LC6670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understood, for they simply meant--“Oh, but ain&#39;t you glad _now_ we&#39;re</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6671"></td>
        <td id="LC6671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6672"></td>
        <td id="LC6672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6673"></td>
        <td id="LC6673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe&#39;s knife struck upon something.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6674"></td>
        <td id="LC6674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6675"></td>
        <td id="LC6675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hello!” said he.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6676"></td>
        <td id="LC6676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6677"></td>
        <td id="LC6677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What is it?” said his comrade.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6678"></td>
        <td id="LC6678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6679"></td>
        <td id="LC6679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Half-rotten plank--no, it&#39;s a box, I believe. Here--bear a hand and we&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6680"></td>
        <td id="LC6680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see what it&#39;s here for. Never mind, I&#39;ve broke a hole.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6681"></td>
        <td id="LC6681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6682"></td>
        <td id="LC6682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He reached his hand in and drew it out--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6683"></td>
        <td id="LC6683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6684"></td>

        <td id="L6774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6774"></td>

        <td id="L6776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6776"></td>
        <td id="LC6776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Number Two,” wherever that might be. Then a ghastly thought occurred to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6777"></td>
        <td id="LC6777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6778"></td>
        <td id="LC6778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6779"></td>
        <td id="LC6779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Revenge? What if he means _us_, Huck!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6780"></td>
        <td id="LC6780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6781"></td>
        <td id="LC6781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, don&#39;t!” said Huck, nearly fainting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6782"></td>
        <td id="LC6782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6783"></td>
        <td id="LC6783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They talked it all over, and as they entered town they agreed to believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6784"></td>
        <td id="LC6784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he might possibly mean somebody else--at least that he might at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6785"></td>
        <td id="LC6785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least mean nobody but Tom, since only Tom had testified.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6786"></td>
        <td id="LC6786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6787"></td>
        <td id="LC6787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very, very small comfort it was to Tom to be alone in danger! Company</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6788"></td>
        <td id="LC6788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be a palpable improvement, he thought.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6789"></td>
        <td id="LC6789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6792"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6793"></td>
        <td id="LC6793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXVII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6794"></td>
        <td id="LC6794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6795"></td>
        <td id="LC6795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE adventure of the day mightily tormented Tom&#39;s dreams that night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6796"></td>
        <td id="LC6796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Four times he had his hands on that rich treasure and four times</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6797"></td>
        <td id="LC6797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it wasted to nothingness in his fingers as sleep forsook him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6798"></td>
        <td id="LC6798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wakefulness brought back the hard reality of his misfortune. As he lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6799"></td>
        <td id="LC6799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the early morning recalling the incidents of his great adventure, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6800"></td>
        <td id="LC6800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noticed that they seemed curiously subdued and far away--somewhat as if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6801"></td>
        <td id="LC6801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had happened in another world, or in a time long gone by. Then it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6802"></td>
        <td id="LC6802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occurred to him that the great adventure itself must be a dream! There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6803"></td>
        <td id="LC6803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was one very strong argument in favor of this idea--namely, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6804"></td>
        <td id="LC6804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quantity of coin he had seen was too vast to be real. He had never seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6805"></td>
        <td id="LC6805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as much as fifty dollars in one mass before, and he was like all boys of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6806"></td>
        <td id="LC6806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his age and station in life, in that he imagined that all references to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6807"></td>
        <td id="LC6807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“hundreds” and “thousands” were mere fanciful forms of speech, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6808"></td>
        <td id="LC6808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no such sums really existed in the world. He never had supposed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6809"></td>
        <td id="LC6809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a moment that so large a sum as a hundred dollars was to be found in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6810"></td>
        <td id="LC6810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">actual money in any one&#39;s possession. If his notions of hidden treasure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6811"></td>
        <td id="LC6811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been analyzed, they would have been found to consist of a handful of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6812"></td>
        <td id="LC6812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">real dimes and a bushel of vague, splendid, ungraspable dollars.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6813"></td>
        <td id="LC6813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6814"></td>
        <td id="LC6814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the incidents of his adventure grew sensibly sharper and clearer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6815"></td>
        <td id="LC6815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the attrition of thinking them over, and so he presently found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6816"></td>
        <td id="LC6816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself leaning to the impression that the thing might not have been a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6817"></td>
        <td id="LC6817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dream, after all. This uncertainty must be swept away. He would snatch a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6818"></td>
        <td id="LC6818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hurried breakfast and go and find Huck. Huck was sitting on the gunwale</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6819"></td>
        <td id="LC6819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a flatboat, listlessly dangling his feet in the water and looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6820"></td>
        <td id="LC6820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very melancholy. Tom concluded to let Huck lead up to the subject. If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6821"></td>
        <td id="LC6821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he did not do it, then the adventure would be proved to have been only a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6822"></td>
        <td id="LC6822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dream.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6823"></td>
        <td id="LC6823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6824"></td>
        <td id="LC6824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hello, Huck!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6825"></td>
        <td id="LC6825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L6826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6826"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6827"></td>

        <td id="L6828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6828"></td>
        <td id="LC6828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Silence, for a minute.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6829"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6837"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L6840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6840"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6841"></td>

        <td id="L6845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6845"></td>
        <td id="LC6845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6846"></td>

        <td id="LC6847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a pile--and that one&#39;s lost. I&#39;d feel mighty shaky if I was to see him,</td>

        <td id="L6849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6849"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6850"></td>
        <td id="LC6850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, so&#39;d I; but I&#39;d like to see him, anyway--and track him out--to his</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6851"></td>
        <td id="LC6851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Number Two.”</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6857"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6858"></td>
        <td id="LC6858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Goody!... No, Tom, that ain&#39;t it. If it is, it ain&#39;t in this one-horse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6859"></td>

        <td id="L6860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6860"></td>

        <td id="LC6861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, that&#39;s so. Lemme think a minute. Here--it&#39;s the number of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6862"></td>
        <td id="LC6862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room--in a tavern, you know!”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6863"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6864"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6865"></td>
        <td id="LC6865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quick.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6866"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You stay here, Huck, till I come.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6868"></td>
        <td id="LC6868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6869"></td>
        <td id="LC6869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom was off at once. He did not care to have Huck&#39;s company in public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6870"></td>
        <td id="LC6870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places. He was gone half an hour. He found that in the best tavern, No.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6871"></td>
        <td id="LC6871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">2 had long been occupied by a young lawyer, and was still so occupied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6872"></td>
        <td id="LC6872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the less ostentatious house, No. 2 was a mystery. The tavern-keeper&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6873"></td>
        <td id="LC6873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young son said it was kept locked all the time, and he never saw anybody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6874"></td>
        <td id="LC6874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go into it or come out of it except at night; he did not know any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6875"></td>
        <td id="LC6875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular reason for this state of things; had had some little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6876"></td>
        <td id="LC6876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curiosity, but it was rather feeble; had made the most of the mystery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6877"></td>
        <td id="LC6877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by entertaining himself with the idea that that room was “ha&#39;nted”; had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6878"></td>
        <td id="LC6878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noticed that there was a light in there the night before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6879"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6880"></td>
        <td id="LC6880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s what I&#39;ve found out, Huck. I reckon that&#39;s the very No. 2 we&#39;re</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6881"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6882"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6883"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC6884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6886"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6887"></td>
        <td id="LC6887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom thought a long time. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6888"></td>
        <td id="LC6888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6889"></td>
        <td id="LC6889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;ll tell you. The back door of that No. 2 is the door that comes out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6890"></td>
        <td id="LC6890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into that little close alley between the tavern and the old rattle trap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6891"></td>
        <td id="LC6891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a brick store. Now you get hold of all the doorkeys you can find, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6892"></td>
        <td id="LC6892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I&#39;ll nip all of auntie&#39;s, and the first dark night we&#39;ll go there and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6893"></td>
        <td id="LC6893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try &#39;em. And mind you, keep a lookout for Injun Joe, because he said he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6894"></td>
        <td id="LC6894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was going to drop into town and spy around once more for a chance to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6895"></td>
        <td id="LC6895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his revenge. If you see him, you just follow him; and if he don&#39;t go to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6896"></td>
        <td id="LC6896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that No. 2, that ain&#39;t the place.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6897"></td>
        <td id="LC6897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6898"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6899"></td>
        <td id="LC6899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6900"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6901"></td>
        <td id="LC6901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maybe he&#39;d never think anything.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6902"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6903"></td>
        <td id="LC6903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, if it&#39;s pretty dark I reckon I&#39;ll track him. I dono--I dono. I&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6904"></td>
        <td id="LC6904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6905"></td>
        <td id="LC6905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6906"></td>
        <td id="LC6906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You bet I&#39;ll follow him, if it&#39;s dark, Huck. Why, he might &#39;a&#39; found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6907"></td>
        <td id="LC6907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out he couldn&#39;t get his revenge, and be going right after that money.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6908"></td>
        <td id="LC6908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6910"></td>
        <td id="LC6910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6911"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6912"></td>
        <td id="LC6912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6915"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6916"></td>
        <td id="LC6916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXVIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6917"></td>
        <td id="LC6917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6918"></td>
        <td id="LC6918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THAT night Tom and Huck were ready for their adventure. They hung about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6919"></td>
        <td id="LC6919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the neighborhood of the tavern until after nine, one watching the alley</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6920"></td>
        <td id="LC6920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at a distance and the other the tavern door. Nobody entered the alley or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6921"></td>
        <td id="LC6921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left it; nobody resembling the Spaniard entered or left the tavern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6922"></td>
        <td id="LC6922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door. The night promised to be a fair one; so Tom went home with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6923"></td>
        <td id="LC6923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding that if a considerable degree of darkness came on, Huck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6924"></td>
        <td id="LC6924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to come and “maow,” whereupon he would slip out and try the keys.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6925"></td>
        <td id="LC6925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the night remained clear, and Huck closed his watch and retired to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6926"></td>
        <td id="LC6926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed in an empty sugar hogshead about twelve.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6927"></td>
        <td id="LC6927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6928"></td>
        <td id="LC6928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tuesday the boys had the same ill luck. Also Wednesday. But Thursday</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6929"></td>
        <td id="LC6929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night promised better. Tom slipped out in good season with his aunt&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6930"></td>
        <td id="LC6930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old tin lantern, and a large towel to blindfold it with. He hid the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6931"></td>
        <td id="LC6931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lantern in Huck&#39;s sugar hogshead and the watch began. An hour before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6932"></td>
        <td id="LC6932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">midnight the tavern closed up and its lights (the only ones thereabouts)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6933"></td>
        <td id="LC6933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were put out. No Spaniard had been seen. Nobody had entered or left the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6934"></td>
        <td id="LC6934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alley. Everything was auspicious. The blackness of darkness reigned,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6935"></td>
        <td id="LC6935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the perfect stillness was interrupted only by occasional mutterings of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6936"></td>
        <td id="LC6936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distant thunder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6937"></td>
        <td id="LC6937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6938"></td>
        <td id="LC6938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom got his lantern, lit it in the hogshead, wrapped it closely in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6939"></td>
        <td id="LC6939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towel, and the two adventurers crept in the gloom toward the tavern.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6940"></td>
        <td id="LC6940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck stood sentry and Tom felt his way into the alley. Then there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6941"></td>
        <td id="LC6941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a season of waiting anxiety that weighed upon Huck&#39;s spirits like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6942"></td>
        <td id="LC6942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mountain. He began to wish he could see a flash from the lantern--it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6943"></td>
        <td id="LC6943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would frighten him, but it would at least tell him that Tom was alive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6944"></td>
        <td id="LC6944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet. It seemed hours since Tom had disappeared. Surely he must have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6945"></td>
        <td id="LC6945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fainted; maybe he was dead; maybe his heart had burst under terror and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6946"></td>
        <td id="LC6946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excitement. In his uneasiness Huck found himself drawing closer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6947"></td>
        <td id="LC6947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and closer to the alley; fearing all sorts of dreadful things, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6948"></td>
        <td id="LC6948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">momentarily expecting some catastrophe to happen that would take away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6949"></td>
        <td id="LC6949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his breath. There was not much to take away, for he seemed only able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6950"></td>
        <td id="LC6950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inhale it by thimblefuls, and his heart would soon wear itself out, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6951"></td>
        <td id="LC6951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way it was beating. Suddenly there was a flash of light and Tom came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6952"></td>
        <td id="LC6952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tearing by him: “Run!” said he; “run, for your life!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6953"></td>
        <td id="LC6953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6954"></td>
        <td id="LC6954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He needn&#39;t have repeated it; once was enough; Huck was making thirty or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6955"></td>
        <td id="LC6955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forty miles an hour before the repetition was uttered. The boys never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6956"></td>
        <td id="LC6956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopped till they reached the shed of a deserted slaughter-house at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6957"></td>
        <td id="LC6957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lower end of the village. Just as they got within its shelter the storm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6958"></td>
        <td id="LC6958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burst and the rain poured down. As soon as Tom got his breath he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6959"></td>
        <td id="LC6959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6960"></td>
        <td id="LC6960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Huck, it was awful! I tried two of the keys, just as soft as I could;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6961"></td>
        <td id="LC6961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but they seemed to make such a power of racket that I couldn&#39;t hardly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6962"></td>
        <td id="LC6962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get my breath I was so scared. They wouldn&#39;t turn in the lock, either.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6963"></td>
        <td id="LC6963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, without noticing what I was doing, I took hold of the knob, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6964"></td>
        <td id="LC6964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">open comes the door! It warn&#39;t locked! I hopped in, and shook off the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6965"></td>
        <td id="LC6965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towel, and, _Great Caesar&#39;s Ghost!_”</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC7028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you?”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7029"></td>

        <td id="LC7030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I said I would, Tom, and I will. I&#39;ll ha&#39;nt that tavern every night for</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC7031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a year! I&#39;ll sleep all day and I&#39;ll stand watch all night.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7032"></td>
        <td id="LC7032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7033"></td>
        <td id="LC7033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s all right. Now, where you going to sleep?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7034"></td>
        <td id="LC7034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7035"></td>
        <td id="LC7035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In Ben Rogers&#39; hayloft. He lets me, and so does his pap&#39;s nigger man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7036"></td>
        <td id="LC7036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Uncle Jake. I tote water for Uncle Jake whenever he wants me to, and any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7037"></td>
        <td id="LC7037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time I ask him he gives me a little something to eat if he can spare it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7038"></td>
        <td id="LC7038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That&#39;s a mighty good nigger, Tom. He likes me, becuz I don&#39;t ever act as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7039"></td>
        <td id="LC7039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I was above him. Sometime I&#39;ve set right down and eat _with_ him. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7040"></td>
        <td id="LC7040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you needn&#39;t tell that. A body&#39;s got to do things when he&#39;s awful hungry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7041"></td>
        <td id="LC7041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he wouldn&#39;t want to do as a steady thing.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7042"></td>
        <td id="LC7042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7043"></td>
        <td id="LC7043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, if I don&#39;t want you in the daytime, I&#39;ll let you sleep. I won&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7044"></td>
        <td id="LC7044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come bothering around. Any time you see something&#39;s up, in the night,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7045"></td>
        <td id="LC7045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just skip right around and maow.”</td>

        <td id="L7046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7046"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7049"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7050"></td>
        <td id="LC7050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXIX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7051"></td>
        <td id="LC7051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7052"></td>
        <td id="LC7052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE first thing Tom heard on Friday morning was a glad piece of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7053"></td>
        <td id="LC7053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">news--Judge Thatcher&#39;s family had come back to town the night before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7054"></td>
        <td id="LC7054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Both Injun Joe and the treasure sunk into secondary importance for a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7055"></td>

        <td id="L7058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7058"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7061"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7067"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7235"></td>
        <td id="LC7235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the moment that elapsed between the stranger&#39;s remark and Injun Joe&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7236"></td>
        <td id="LC7236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next--which was--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7237"></td>
        <td id="LC7237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7238"></td>
        <td id="LC7238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Because the bush is in your way. Now--this way--now you see, don&#39;t you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7239"></td>
        <td id="LC7239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7240"></td>
        <td id="LC7240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. Well, there _is_ company there, I reckon. Better give it up.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7241"></td>
        <td id="LC7241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7242"></td>
        <td id="LC7242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Give it up, and I just leaving this country forever! Give it up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7243"></td>
        <td id="LC7243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maybe never have another chance. I tell you again, as I&#39;ve told you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7244"></td>
        <td id="LC7244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before, I don&#39;t care for her swag--you may have it. But her husband was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7245"></td>
        <td id="LC7245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rough on me--many times he was rough on me--and mainly he was the justice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7246"></td>
        <td id="LC7246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the peace that jugged me for a vagrant. And that ain&#39;t all. It ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7247"></td>
        <td id="LC7247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a millionth part of it! He had me _horsewhipped_!--horsewhipped in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7248"></td>
        <td id="LC7248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">front of the jail, like a nigger!--with all the town looking on!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7249"></td>
        <td id="LC7249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Horsewhipped_!--do you understand? He took advantage of me and died. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7250"></td>
        <td id="LC7250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I&#39;ll take it out of _her_.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7251"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7254"></td>

        <td id="LC7255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here; but not her. When you want to get revenge on a woman you don&#39;t</td>

        <td id="L7256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7256"></td>
        <td id="LC7256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kill her--bosh! you go for her looks. You slit her nostrils--you notch her</td>

        <td id="LC7257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ears like a sow!”</td>

        <td id="L7275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7275"></td>

        <td id="L7287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7287"></td>

        <td id="L7321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7321"></td>
        <td id="LC7321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7322"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7323"></td>
        <td id="LC7323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AS the earliest suspicion of dawn appeared on Sunday morning, Huck came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7324"></td>
        <td id="LC7324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">groping up the hill and rapped gently at the old Welshman&#39;s door. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7325"></td>
        <td id="LC7325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inmates were asleep, but it was a sleep that was set on a hair-trigger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7326"></td>
        <td id="LC7326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on account of the exciting episode of the night. A call came from a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7327"></td>
        <td id="LC7327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7328"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7330"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7331"></td>
        <td id="LC7331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck&#39;s scared voice answered in a low tone:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7332"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7334"></td>
        <td id="LC7334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7336"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7337"></td>
        <td id="LC7337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These were strange words to the vagabond boy&#39;s ears, and the pleasantest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7338"></td>
        <td id="LC7338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had ever heard. He could not recollect that the closing word had ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7339"></td>
        <td id="LC7339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been applied in his case before. The door was quickly unlocked, and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7340"></td>
        <td id="LC7340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered. Huck was given a seat and the old man and his brace of tall</td>

        <td id="L7341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7341"></td>
        <td id="LC7341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sons speedily dressed themselves.</td>

        <td id="L7347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7347"></td>

        <td id="LC7348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was awful scared,” said Huck, “and I run. I took out when the pistols</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7349"></td>

        <td id="L7350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7350"></td>
        <td id="LC7350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to know about it, you know; and I come before daylight becuz I didn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7351"></td>
        <td id="LC7351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want to run across them devils, even if they was dead.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7352"></td>
        <td id="LC7352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7353"></td>
        <td id="LC7353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, poor chap, you do look as if you&#39;d had a hard night of it--but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7354"></td>
        <td id="LC7354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there&#39;s a bed here for you when you&#39;ve had your breakfast. No, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7355"></td>
        <td id="LC7355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ain&#39;t dead, lad--we are sorry enough for that. You see we knew right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7356"></td>
        <td id="LC7356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where to put our hands on them, by your description; so we crept along</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7357"></td>
        <td id="LC7357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on tiptoe till we got within fifteen feet of them--dark as a cellar that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7358"></td>
        <td id="LC7358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sumach path was--and just then I found I was going to sneeze. It was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7359"></td>
        <td id="LC7359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meanest kind of luck! I tried to keep it back, but no use--&#39;twas bound to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7360"></td>
        <td id="LC7360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come, and it did come! I was in the lead with my pistol raised, and when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7361"></td>
        <td id="LC7361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sneeze started those scoundrels a-rustling to get out of the path,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7362"></td>
        <td id="LC7362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I sung out, &#39;Fire boys!&#39; and blazed away at the place where the rustling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7363"></td>
        <td id="LC7363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was. So did the boys. But they were off in a jiffy, those villains, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we after them, down through the woods. I judge we never touched them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7365"></td>
        <td id="LC7365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They fired a shot apiece as they started, but their bullets whizzed by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7366"></td>
        <td id="LC7366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and didn&#39;t do us any harm. As soon as we lost the sound of their feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we quit chasing, and went down and stirred up the constables. They got a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7368"></td>
        <td id="LC7368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">posse together, and went off to guard the river bank, and as soon as it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7369"></td>
        <td id="LC7369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is light the sheriff and a gang are going to beat up the woods. My boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7370"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7386"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7396"></td>
        <td id="LC7396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the young men were gone, the old Welshman said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7397"></td>
        <td id="LC7397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“They won&#39;t tell--and I won&#39;t. But why don&#39;t you want it known?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7399"></td>
        <td id="LC7399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7400"></td>
        <td id="LC7400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck would not explain, further than to say that he already knew too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7401"></td>
        <td id="LC7401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much about one of those men and would not have the man know that he knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7402"></td>
        <td id="LC7402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything against him for the whole world--he would be killed for knowing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7403"></td>
        <td id="LC7403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, sure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7404"></td>
