      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7405"></td>
        <td id="LC7405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The old man promised secrecy once more, and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7406"></td>
        <td id="LC7406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7407"></td>
        <td id="LC7407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How did you come to follow these fellows, lad? Were they looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7408"></td>
        <td id="LC7408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicious?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7409"></td>
        <td id="LC7409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7410"></td>
        <td id="LC7410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck was silent while he framed a duly cautious reply. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7411"></td>
        <td id="LC7411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7412"></td>
        <td id="LC7412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, you see, I&#39;m a kind of a hard lot,--least everybody says so, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7413"></td>
        <td id="LC7413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I don&#39;t see nothing agin it--and sometimes I can&#39;t sleep much, on account</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7414"></td>
        <td id="LC7414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of thinking about it and sort of trying to strike out a new way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7415"></td>
        <td id="LC7415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing. That was the way of it last night. I couldn&#39;t sleep, and so I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7416"></td>
        <td id="LC7416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come along upstreet &#39;bout midnight, a-turning it all over, and when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7417"></td>
        <td id="LC7417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got to that old shackly brick store by the Temperance Tavern, I backed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7418"></td>
        <td id="LC7418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up agin the wall to have another think. Well, just then along comes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7419"></td>
        <td id="LC7419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these two chaps slipping along close by me, with something under their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7420"></td>
        <td id="LC7420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arm, and I reckoned they&#39;d stole it. One was a-smoking, and t&#39;other one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7421"></td>
        <td id="LC7421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted a light; so they stopped right before me and the cigars lit up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7422"></td>
        <td id="LC7422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their faces and I see that the big one was the deaf and dumb Spaniard,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7423"></td>
        <td id="LC7423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by his white whiskers and the patch on his eye, and t&#39;other one was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7424"></td>
        <td id="LC7424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rusty, ragged-looking devil.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7425"></td>
        <td id="LC7425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7426"></td>
        <td id="LC7426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Could you see the rags by the light of the cigars?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7427"></td>
        <td id="LC7427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7428"></td>
        <td id="LC7428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This staggered Huck for a moment. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7429"></td>
        <td id="LC7429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7430"></td>
        <td id="LC7430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I don&#39;t know--but somehow it seems as if I did.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7431"></td>
        <td id="LC7431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7432"></td>
        <td id="LC7432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then they went on, and you--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7433"></td>
        <td id="LC7433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7434"></td>
        <td id="LC7434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Follered &#39;em--yes. That was it. I wanted to see what was up--they sneaked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7435"></td>
        <td id="LC7435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along so. I dogged &#39;em to the widder&#39;s stile, and stood in the dark and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7436"></td>
        <td id="LC7436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard the ragged one beg for the widder, and the Spaniard swear he&#39;d</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7437"></td>
        <td id="LC7437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spile her looks just as I told you and your two--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7438"></td>
        <td id="LC7438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7439"></td>
        <td id="LC7439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What! The _deaf and dumb_ man said all that!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7440"></td>
        <td id="LC7440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7441"></td>
        <td id="LC7441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck had made another terrible mistake! He was trying his best to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7442"></td>
        <td id="LC7442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the old man from getting the faintest hint of who the Spaniard might be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7443"></td>
        <td id="LC7443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and yet his tongue seemed determined to get him into trouble in spite of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7444"></td>
        <td id="LC7444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all he could do. He made several efforts to creep out of his scrape,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7445"></td>
        <td id="LC7445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the old man&#39;s eye was upon him and he made blunder after blunder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7446"></td>
        <td id="LC7446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently the Welshman said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7447"></td>
        <td id="LC7447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7448"></td>
        <td id="LC7448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My boy, don&#39;t be afraid of me. I wouldn&#39;t hurt a hair of your head for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7449"></td>
        <td id="LC7449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the world. No--I&#39;d protect you--I&#39;d protect you. This Spaniard is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7450"></td>
        <td id="LC7450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not deaf and dumb; you&#39;ve let that slip without intending it; you can&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7451"></td>
        <td id="LC7451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cover that up now. You know something about that Spaniard that you want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7452"></td>
        <td id="LC7452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to keep dark. Now trust me--tell me what it is, and trust me--I won&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7453"></td>
        <td id="LC7453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">betray you.”</td>

        <td id="L7454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7454"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7455"></td>
        <td id="LC7455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck looked into the old man&#39;s honest eyes a moment, then bent over and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7456"></td>
        <td id="LC7456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispered in his ear:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7457"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7459"></td>
        <td id="LC7459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7460"></td>
        <td id="LC7460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Welshman almost jumped out of his chair. In a moment he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7461"></td>
        <td id="LC7461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7462"></td>
        <td id="LC7462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s all plain enough, now. When you talked about notching ears and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7463"></td>
        <td id="LC7463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slitting noses I judged that that was your own embellishment, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7464"></td>
        <td id="LC7464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white men don&#39;t take that sort of revenge. But an Injun! That&#39;s a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7465"></td>
        <td id="LC7465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different matter altogether.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7466"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7467"></td>
        <td id="LC7467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">During breakfast the talk went on, and in the course of it the old man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7468"></td>
        <td id="LC7468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said that the last thing which he and his sons had done, before going</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7469"></td>
        <td id="LC7469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to bed, was to get a lantern and examine the stile and its vicinity for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7470"></td>
        <td id="LC7470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marks of blood. They found none, but captured a bulky bundle of--</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7471"></td>
        <td id="LC7471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7472"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7473"></td>
        <td id="LC7473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7474"></td>
        <td id="LC7474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If the words had been lightning they could not have leaped with a more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7475"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7476"></td>
        <td id="LC7476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wide, now, and his breath suspended--waiting for the answer. The Welshman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7477"></td>
        <td id="LC7477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started--stared in return--three seconds--five seconds--ten--then replied:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7478"></td>
        <td id="LC7478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7479"></td>
        <td id="LC7479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of burglar&#39;s tools. Why, what&#39;s the _matter_ with you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7480"></td>
        <td id="LC7480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7481"></td>
        <td id="LC7481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck sank back, panting gently, but deeply, unutterably grateful. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7482"></td>
        <td id="LC7482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Welshman eyed him gravely, curiously--and presently said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7483"></td>
        <td id="LC7483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7484"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7486"></td>
        <td id="LC7486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7487"></td>
        <td id="LC7487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck was in a close place--the inquiring eye was upon him--he would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7488"></td>
        <td id="LC7488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">given anything for material for a plausible answer--nothing suggested</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7489"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7490"></td>
        <td id="LC7490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reply offered--there was no time to weigh it, so at a venture he uttered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7491"></td>
        <td id="LC7491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it--feebly:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7492"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7493"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7494"></td>
        <td id="LC7494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7495"></td>
        <td id="LC7495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Poor Huck was too distressed to smile, but the old man laughed loud and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7496"></td>
        <td id="LC7496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">joyously, shook up the details of his anatomy from head to foot, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7497"></td>
        <td id="LC7497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ended by saying that such a laugh was money in a-man&#39;s pocket, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7498"></td>
        <td id="LC7498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it cut down the doctor&#39;s bill like everything. Then he added:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7499"></td>
        <td id="LC7499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7500"></td>
        <td id="LC7500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Poor old chap, you&#39;re white and jaded--you ain&#39;t well a bit--no wonder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7501"></td>
        <td id="LC7501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you&#39;re a little flighty and off your balance. But you&#39;ll come out of it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7502"></td>
        <td id="LC7502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Rest and sleep will fetch you out all right, I hope.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7503"></td>
        <td id="LC7503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7504"></td>
        <td id="LC7504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck was irritated to think he had been such a goose and betrayed such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7505"></td>
        <td id="LC7505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a suspicious excitement, for he had dropped the idea that the parcel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7506"></td>
        <td id="LC7506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought from the tavern was the treasure, as soon as he had heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7507"></td>
        <td id="LC7507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk at the widow&#39;s stile. He had only thought it was not the treasure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7508"></td>
        <td id="LC7508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however--he had not known that it wasn&#39;t--and so the suggestion of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7509"></td>
        <td id="LC7509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captured bundle was too much for his self-possession. But on the whole</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7603"></td>
        <td id="LC7603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last, all the word that came was, “Send more candles--and send food.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7604"></td>
        <td id="LC7604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> Mrs. Thatcher was almost crazed; and Aunt Polly, also. Judge Thatcher</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7605"></td>

        <td id="L7606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7606"></td>

        <td id="L7608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7608"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7683"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7684"></td>
        <td id="LC7684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonders of the cave--wonders dubbed with rather over-descriptive names,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7685"></td>
        <td id="LC7685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such as “The Drawing-Room,” “The Cathedral,” “Aladdin&#39;s Palace,” and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7687"></td>
        <td id="LC7687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engaged in it with zeal until the exertion began to grow a trifle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7688"></td>
        <td id="LC7688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wearisome; then they wandered down a sinuous avenue holding their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7689"></td>
        <td id="LC7689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">candles aloft and reading the tangled webwork of names, dates,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7690"></td>
        <td id="LC7690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">postoffice addresses, and mottoes with which the rocky walls had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7691"></td>
        <td id="LC7691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frescoed (in candle-smoke). Still drifting along and talking, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7692"></td>
        <td id="LC7692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scarcely noticed that they were now in a part of the cave whose walls</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7693"></td>
        <td id="LC7693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were not frescoed. They smoked their own names under an overhanging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7694"></td>
        <td id="LC7694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shelf and moved on. Presently they came to a place where a little stream</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7695"></td>
        <td id="LC7695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of water, trickling over a ledge and carrying a limestone sediment with</td>

        <td id="LC7700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narrow walls, and at once the ambition to be a discoverer seized him.</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L7781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7781"></td>

        <td id="L7783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7783"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7784"></td>
        <td id="LC7784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The “might” was even a chillier horror than the ghostly laughter, it so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7785"></td>
        <td id="LC7785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confessed a perishing hope. The children stood still and listened; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7786"></td>
        <td id="LC7786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was no result. Tom turned upon the back track at once, and hurried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7787"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7879"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7973"></td>
        <td id="LC7973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on; they slept again, and awoke famished and woe-stricken. Tom believed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7974"></td>
        <td id="LC7974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it must be Tuesday by this time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7975"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7976"></td>
        <td id="LC7976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now an idea struck him. There were some side passages near at hand. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7977"></td>
        <td id="LC7977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be better to explore some of these than bear the weight of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7978"></td>
        <td id="LC7978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavy time in idleness. He took a kite-line from his pocket, tied it to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7979"></td>
        <td id="LC7979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a projection, and he and Becky started, Tom in the lead, unwinding the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7980"></td>
        <td id="LC7980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">line as he groped along. At the end of twenty steps the corridor ended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7981"></td>
        <td id="LC7981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a “jumping-off place.” Tom got down on his knees and felt below,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7982"></td>

        <td id="L7983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7983"></td>
        <td id="LC7983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conveniently; he made an effort to stretch yet a little farther to the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7984"></td>
        <td id="LC7984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right, and at that moment, not twenty yards away, a human hand, holding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7985"></td>
        <td id="LC7985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a candle, appeared from behind a rock! Tom lifted up a glorious shout,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7986"></td>
        <td id="LC7986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and instantly that hand was followed by the body it belonged to--Injun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7987"></td>
        <td id="LC7987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe&#39;s! Tom was paralyzed; he could not move. He was vastly gratified the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7988"></td>

        <td id="L8022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8022"></td>
        <td id="LC8022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TUESDAY afternoon came, and waned to the twilight. The village of St.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8023"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8024"></td>

        <td id="L8025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8025"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC8028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children could never be found. Mrs. Thatcher was very ill, and a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8032"></td>
        <td id="LC8032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a settled melancholy, and her gray hair had grown almost white. The</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8033"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8034"></td>
        <td id="LC8034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8035"></td>
        <td id="LC8035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Away in the middle of the night a wild peal burst from the village</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8036"></td>
        <td id="LC8036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bells, and in a moment the streets were swarming with frantic half-clad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8037"></td>

        <td id="L8038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8038"></td>

        <td id="L8040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8040"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8043"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8044"></td>
        <td id="LC8044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The village was illuminated; nobody went to bed again; it was the</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8049"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8050"></td>
        <td id="LC8050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Polly&#39;s happiness was complete, and Mrs. Thatcher&#39;s nearly so. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8051"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8052"></td>
        <td id="LC8052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great news to the cave should get the word to her husband. Tom lay upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8053"></td>
        <td id="LC8053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sofa with an eager auditory about him and told the history of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8054"></td>
        <td id="LC8054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderful adventure, putting in many striking additions to adorn it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8055"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8056"></td>
        <td id="LC8056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on an exploring expedition; how he followed two avenues as far as his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8057"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8058"></td>

        <td id="L8059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8059"></td>
        <td id="LC8059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speck that looked like daylight; dropped the line and groped toward it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8060"></td>
        <td id="LC8060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pushed his head and shoulders through a small hole, and saw the broad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8061"></td>
        <td id="LC8061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mississippi rolling by!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8062"></td>
        <td id="LC8062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8063"></td>
        <td id="LC8063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And if it had only happened to be night he would not have seen that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8064"></td>
        <td id="LC8064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speck of daylight and would not have explored that passage any more! He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8065"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8131"></td>
        <td id="LC8131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">WITHIN a few minutes the news had spread, and a dozen skiff-loads of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8132"></td>
        <td id="LC8132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men were on their way to McDougal&#39;s cave, and the ferryboat, well filled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8133"></td>
        <td id="LC8133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with passengers, soon followed. Tom Sawyer was in the skiff that bore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8134"></td>
        <td id="LC8134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Judge Thatcher.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8135"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8136"></td>
        <td id="LC8136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the cave door was unlocked, a sorrowful sight presented itself in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8137"></td>
        <td id="LC8137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dim twilight of the place. Injun Joe lay stretched upon the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8138"></td>
        <td id="LC8138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead, with his face close to the crack of the door, as if his longing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8139"></td>
        <td id="LC8139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes had been fixed, to the latest moment, upon the light and the cheer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8140"></td>
        <td id="LC8140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the free world outside. Tom was touched, for he knew by his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8141"></td>
        <td id="LC8141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experience how this wretch had suffered. His pity was moved, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8142"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8143"></td>
        <td id="LC8143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which revealed to him in a degree which he had not fully appreciated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8144"></td>
        <td id="LC8144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before how vast a weight of dread had been lying upon him since the day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8145"></td>
        <td id="LC8145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he lifted his voice against this bloody-minded outcast.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8146"></td>
        <td id="LC8146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8147"></td>
        <td id="LC8147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Injun Joe&#39;s bowie-knife lay close by, its blade broken in two. The great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8148"></td>
        <td id="LC8148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foundation-beam of the door had been chipped and hacked through, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8149"></td>
        <td id="LC8149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tedious labor; useless labor, too, it was, for the native rock formed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8150"></td>
        <td id="LC8150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sill outside it, and upon that stubborn material the knife had wrought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8151"></td>
        <td id="LC8151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no effect; the only damage done was to the knife itself. But if there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8152"></td>
        <td id="LC8152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been no stony obstruction there the labor would have been useless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8153"></td>
        <td id="LC8153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still, for if the beam had been wholly cut away Injun Joe could not have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8154"></td>
        <td id="LC8154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squeezed his body under the door, and he knew it. So he had only hacked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8155"></td>
        <td id="LC8155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that place in order to be doing something--in order to pass the weary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8156"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8339"></td>
        <td id="LC8339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lead. They toiled their way to the farther end of the tunnel, then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8340"></td>
        <td id="LC8340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made their spliced kite-strings fast and moved on. A few steps brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8341"></td>
        <td id="LC8341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them to the spring, and Tom felt a shudder quiver all through him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8342"></td>
        <td id="LC8342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He showed Huck the fragment of candle-wick perched on a lump of clay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8343"></td>
        <td id="LC8343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the wall, and described how he and Becky had watched the flame</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8344"></td>
        <td id="LC8344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggle and expire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8345"></td>
        <td id="LC8345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8346"></td>
        <td id="LC8346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys began to quiet down to whispers, now, for the stillness and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8347"></td>
        <td id="LC8347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom of the place oppressed their spirits. They went on, and presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8348"></td>
        <td id="LC8348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered and followed Tom&#39;s other corridor until they reached the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8349"></td>
        <td id="LC8349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“jumping-off place.” The candles revealed the fact that it was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8350"></td>
        <td id="LC8350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">really a precipice, but only a steep clay hill twenty or thirty feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8351"></td>
        <td id="LC8351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high. Tom whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8352"></td>
        <td id="LC8352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8353"></td>
        <td id="LC8353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now I&#39;ll show you something, Huck.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8354"></td>
        <td id="LC8354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8355"></td>
        <td id="LC8355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He held his candle aloft and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8356"></td>
        <td id="LC8356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8357"></td>
        <td id="LC8357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Look as far around the corner as you can. Do you see that? There--on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8358"></td>
        <td id="LC8358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">big rock over yonder--done with candle-smoke.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8359"></td>
        <td id="LC8359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8360"></td>
        <td id="LC8360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom, it&#39;s a _cross_!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8361"></td>
        <td id="LC8361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8362"></td>
        <td id="LC8362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_Now_ where&#39;s your Number Two? &#39;_under the cross_,&#39; hey? Right yonder&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8363"></td>
        <td id="LC8363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where I saw Injun Joe poke up his candle, Huck!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8364"></td>
        <td id="LC8364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8365"></td>
        <td id="LC8365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck stared at the mystic sign awhile, and then said with a shaky voice:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8366"></td>
        <td id="LC8366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8367"></td>
        <td id="LC8367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom, less git out of here!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8368"></td>
        <td id="LC8368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8369"></td>
        <td id="LC8369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What! and leave the treasure?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8370"></td>
        <td id="LC8370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8371"></td>
        <td id="LC8371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes--leave it. Injun Joe&#39;s ghost is round about there, certain.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8372"></td>
        <td id="LC8372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8373"></td>
        <td id="LC8373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No it ain&#39;t, Huck, no it ain&#39;t. It would ha&#39;nt the place where he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8374"></td>
        <td id="LC8374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">died--away out at the mouth of the cave--five mile from here.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8375"></td>
        <td id="LC8375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8376"></td>
        <td id="LC8376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, Tom, it wouldn&#39;t. It would hang round the money. I know the ways of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8377"></td>
        <td id="LC8377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ghosts, and so do you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8378"></td>
        <td id="LC8378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8379"></td>
        <td id="LC8379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom began to fear that Huck was right. Mis-givings gathered in his mind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8380"></td>
        <td id="LC8380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But presently an idea occurred to him--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8381"></td>
        <td id="LC8381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8382"></td>
        <td id="LC8382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Lookyhere, Huck, what fools we&#39;re making of ourselves! Injun Joe&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8383"></td>
        <td id="LC8383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ghost ain&#39;t a going to come around where there&#39;s a cross!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8384"></td>
        <td id="LC8384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8385"></td>
        <td id="LC8385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The point was well taken. It had its effect.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8386"></td>
        <td id="LC8386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8387"></td>
        <td id="LC8387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom, I didn&#39;t think of that. But that&#39;s so. It&#39;s luck for us, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8388"></td>
        <td id="LC8388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cross is. I reckon we&#39;ll climb down there and have a hunt for that box.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8389"></td>
        <td id="LC8389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8390"></td>
        <td id="LC8390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom went first, cutting rude steps in the clay hill as he descended.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8391"></td>
        <td id="LC8391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck followed. Four avenues opened out of the small cavern which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8392"></td>
        <td id="LC8392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great rock stood in. The boys examined three of them with no result.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8393"></td>
        <td id="LC8393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They found a small recess in the one nearest the base of the rock, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8394"></td>
        <td id="LC8394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a pallet of blankets spread down in it; also an old suspender, some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8395"></td>
        <td id="LC8395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bacon rind, and the well-gnawed bones of two or three fowls. But there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8396"></td>
        <td id="LC8396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was no moneybox. The lads searched and researched this place, but in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8397"></td>
        <td id="LC8397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vain. Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8398"></td>
        <td id="LC8398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8399"></td>
        <td id="LC8399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He said _under_ the cross. Well, this comes nearest to being under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8400"></td>
        <td id="LC8400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cross. It can&#39;t be under the rock itself, because that sets solid on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8401"></td>
        <td id="LC8401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8402"></td>
        <td id="LC8402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8403"></td>
        <td id="LC8403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They searched everywhere once more, and then sat down discouraged. Huck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8404"></td>
        <td id="LC8404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could suggest nothing. By-and-by Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8405"></td>
        <td id="LC8405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8406"></td>
        <td id="LC8406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Lookyhere, Huck, there&#39;s footprints and some candle-grease on the clay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8407"></td>
        <td id="LC8407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about one side of this rock, but not on the other sides. Now, what&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8408"></td>
        <td id="LC8408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that for? I bet you the money _is_ under the rock. I&#39;m going to dig in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8409"></td>
        <td id="LC8409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the clay.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8410"></td>
        <td id="LC8410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8411"></td>
        <td id="LC8411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That ain&#39;t no bad notion, Tom!” said Huck with animation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8412"></td>
        <td id="LC8412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8413"></td>
        <td id="LC8413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom&#39;s “real Barlow” was out at once, and he had not dug four inches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8414"></td>
        <td id="LC8414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before he struck wood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8415"></td>
        <td id="LC8415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8416"></td>
        <td id="LC8416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hey, Huck!--you hear that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8417"></td>
        <td id="LC8417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8418"></td>
        <td id="LC8418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck began to dig and scratch now. Some boards were soon uncovered and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8419"></td>
        <td id="LC8419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">removed. They had concealed a natural chasm which led under the rock.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8420"></td>
        <td id="LC8420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom got into this and held his candle as far under the rock as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8421"></td>
        <td id="LC8421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could, but said he could not see to the end of the rift. He proposed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8422"></td>
        <td id="LC8422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to explore. He stooped and passed under; the narrow way descended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8423"></td>
        <td id="LC8423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gradually. He followed its winding course, first to the right, then to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8424"></td>
        <td id="LC8424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the left, Huck at his heels. Tom turned a short curve, by-and-by, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8425"></td>
        <td id="LC8425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exclaimed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8426"></td>
        <td id="LC8426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8427"></td>
        <td id="LC8427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My goodness, Huck, lookyhere!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8428"></td>
        <td id="LC8428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8429"></td>
        <td id="LC8429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the treasure-box, sure enough, occupying a snug little cavern,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8430"></td>
        <td id="LC8430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along with an empty powder-keg, a couple of guns in leather cases, two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8431"></td>
        <td id="LC8431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or three pairs of old moccasins, a leather belt, and some other rubbish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8432"></td>

        <td id="L8519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8519"></td>

        <td id="L8520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8520"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8523"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8525"></td>
        <td id="LC8525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with humiliation, and frowned and shook her head at Tom. Nobody suffered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8526"></td>
        <td id="LC8526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half as much as the two boys did, however. Mr. Jones said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8527"></td>
        <td id="LC8527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8528"></td>
        <td id="LC8528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tom wasn&#39;t at home, yet, so I gave him up; but I stumbled on him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8529"></td>
        <td id="LC8529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck right at my door, and so I just brought them along in a hurry.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8530"></td>
        <td id="LC8530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8531"></td>
        <td id="LC8531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And you did just right,” said the widow. “Come with me, boys.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8532"></td>
        <td id="LC8532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She took them to a bedchamber and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8534"></td>
        <td id="LC8534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8536"></td>
        <td id="LC8536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothes--shirts, socks, everything complete. They&#39;re Huck&#39;s--no, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8537"></td>
        <td id="LC8537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thanks, Huck--Mr. Jones bought one and I the other. But they&#39;ll fit both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8538"></td>
        <td id="LC8538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of you. Get into them. We&#39;ll wait--come down when you are slicked up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8539"></td>
        <td id="LC8539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough.”</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8540"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC8557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you.”</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L8562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8562"></td>
        <td id="LC8562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got your Sunday clothes ready, and everybody&#39;s been fretting about you.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8564"></td>

        <td id="LC8565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, Mr. Siddy, you jist &#39;tend to your own business. What&#39;s all this</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8566"></td>

        <td id="L8567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8567"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8568"></td>
        <td id="LC8568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s one of the widow&#39;s parties that she&#39;s always having. This time</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8569"></td>
        <td id="LC8569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it&#39;s for the Welshman and his sons, on account of that scrape they</td>

        <td id="L8570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8570"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8572"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L8574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8574"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC8575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, old Mr. Jones is going to try to spring something on the people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8576"></td>
        <td id="LC8576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here tonight, but I overheard him tell auntie today about it, as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8577"></td>
        <td id="LC8577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secret, but I reckon it&#39;s not much of a secret now. Everybody knows--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8578"></td>
        <td id="LC8578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">widow, too, for all she tries to let on she don&#39;t. Mr. Jones was bound</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8579"></td>
        <td id="LC8579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck should be here--couldn&#39;t get along with his grand secret without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8580"></td>
        <td id="LC8580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck, you know!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8581"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8583"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to make a grand time over his surprise, but I bet you it will drop</td>

        <td id="L8588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8588"></td>
        <td id="LC8588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sid chuckled in a very contented and satisfied way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8589"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8595"></td>
        <td id="LC8595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that&#39;s you. If you had been in Huck&#39;s place you&#39;d &#39;a&#39; sneaked down the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8596"></td>
        <td id="LC8596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hill and never told anybody on the robbers. You can&#39;t do any but mean</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8597"></td>
        <td id="LC8597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things, and you can&#39;t bear to see anybody praised for doing good ones.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8598"></td>
        <td id="LC8598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There--no thanks, as the widow says”--and Tom cuffed Sid&#39;s ears and helped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8599"></td>
        <td id="LC8599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him to the door with several kicks. “Now go and tell auntie if you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8600"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8601"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8602"></td>
        <td id="LC8602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Some minutes later the widow&#39;s guests were at the supper-table, and a</td>

        <td id="L8603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8603"></td>

        <td id="L8604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8604"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8605"></td>
        <td id="LC8605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jones made his little speech, in which he thanked the widow for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8606"></td>
        <td id="LC8606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honor she was doing himself and his sons, but said that there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8607"></td>
        <td id="LC8607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another person whose modesty--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8608"></td>
        <td id="LC8608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8609"></td>
        <td id="LC8609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so forth and so on. He sprung his secret about Huck&#39;s share in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8610"></td>
        <td id="LC8610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the adventure in the finest dramatic manner he was master of, but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8611"></td>
        <td id="LC8611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprise it occasioned was largely counterfeit and not as clamorous and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8612"></td>
        <td id="LC8612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effusive as it might have been under happier circumstances. However,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8613"></td>
        <td id="LC8613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the widow made a pretty fair show of astonishment, and heaped so many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8614"></td>
        <td id="LC8614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compliments and so much gratitude upon Huck that he almost forgot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8615"></td>
        <td id="LC8615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the nearly intolerable discomfort of his new clothes in the entirely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8616"></td>
        <td id="LC8616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intolerable discomfort of being set up as a target for everybody&#39;s gaze</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8617"></td>
        <td id="LC8617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and everybody&#39;s laudations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8618"></td>
        <td id="LC8618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
