      <tr>
        <td id="L8798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8798"></td>
        <td id="LC8798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8799"></td>
        <td id="LC8799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, Tom, hain&#39;t you always ben friendly to me? You wouldn&#39;t shet me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8800"></td>
        <td id="LC8800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out, would you, Tom? You wouldn&#39;t do that, now, _would_ you, Tom?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8801"></td>
        <td id="LC8801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8802"></td>
        <td id="LC8802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Huck, I wouldn&#39;t want to, and I _don&#39;t_ want to--but what would people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8803"></td>
        <td id="LC8803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say? Why, they&#39;d say, &#39;Mph! Tom Sawyer&#39;s Gang! pretty low characters in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8804"></td>
        <td id="LC8804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it!&#39; They&#39;d mean you, Huck. You wouldn&#39;t like that, and I wouldn&#39;t.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8805"></td>
        <td id="LC8805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8806"></td>
        <td id="LC8806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck was silent for some time, engaged in a mental struggle. Finally he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8807"></td>
        <td id="LC8807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8808"></td>
        <td id="LC8808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8809"></td>
        <td id="LC8809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I&#39;ll go back to the widder for a month and tackle it and see if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8810"></td>
        <td id="LC8810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can come to stand it, if you&#39;ll let me b&#39;long to the gang, Tom.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8811"></td>
        <td id="LC8811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8812"></td>
        <td id="LC8812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All right, Huck, it&#39;s a whiz! Come along, old chap, and I&#39;ll ask the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8813"></td>
        <td id="LC8813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">widow to let up on you a little, Huck.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8814"></td>
        <td id="LC8814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8815"></td>
        <td id="LC8815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Will you, Tom--now will you? That&#39;s good. If she&#39;ll let up on some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8816"></td>
        <td id="LC8816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the roughest things, I&#39;ll smoke private and cuss private, and crowd</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8817"></td>
        <td id="LC8817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through or bust. When you going to start the gang and turn robbers?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8818"></td>
        <td id="LC8818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8819"></td>
        <td id="LC8819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, right off. We&#39;ll get the boys together and have the initiation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8820"></td>
        <td id="LC8820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tonight, maybe.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8821"></td>
        <td id="LC8821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8822"></td>
        <td id="LC8822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Have the which?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8823"></td>
        <td id="LC8823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8824"></td>
        <td id="LC8824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Have the initiation.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8825"></td>
        <td id="LC8825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8826"></td>
        <td id="LC8826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What&#39;s that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8827"></td>
        <td id="LC8827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8828"></td>
        <td id="LC8828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s to swear to stand by one another, and never tell the gang&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8829"></td>
        <td id="LC8829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secrets, even if you&#39;re chopped all to flinders, and kill anybody and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8830"></td>
        <td id="LC8830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all his family that hurts one of the gang.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8831"></td>
        <td id="LC8831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8832"></td>
        <td id="LC8832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s gay--that&#39;s mighty gay, Tom, I tell you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8833"></td>
        <td id="LC8833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8834"></td>
        <td id="LC8834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I bet it is. And all that swearing&#39;s got to be done at midnight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8835"></td>
        <td id="LC8835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the lonesomest, awfulest place you can find--a ha&#39;nted house is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8836"></td>
        <td id="LC8836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best, but they&#39;re all ripped up now.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8837"></td>
        <td id="LC8837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8838"></td>
        <td id="LC8838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, midnight&#39;s good, anyway, Tom.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8839"></td>
        <td id="LC8839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8840"></td>
        <td id="LC8840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, so it is. And you&#39;ve got to swear on a coffin, and sign it with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8841"></td>
        <td id="LC8841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8842"></td>
        <td id="LC8842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8843"></td>
        <td id="LC8843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, that&#39;s something _like_! Why, it&#39;s a million times bullier than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8844"></td>
        <td id="LC8844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pirating. I&#39;ll stick to the widder till I rot, Tom; and if I git to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8845"></td>
        <td id="LC8845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a reg&#39;lar ripper of a robber, and everybody talking &#39;bout it, I reckon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8846"></td>
        <td id="LC8846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she&#39;ll be proud she snaked me in out of the wet.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8847"></td>
        <td id="LC8847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8848"></td>
        <td id="LC8848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CONCLUSION</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8849"></td>
        <td id="LC8849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8850"></td>
        <td id="LC8850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SO endeth this chronicle. It being strictly a history of a _boy_, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8851"></td>
        <td id="LC8851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must stop here; the story could not go much further without becoming the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8852"></td>
        <td id="LC8852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">history of a _man_. When one writes a novel about grown people, he knows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8853"></td>
        <td id="LC8853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactly where to stop--that is, with a marriage; but when he writes of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8854"></td>
        <td id="LC8854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">juveniles, he must stop where he best can.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8855"></td>
        <td id="LC8855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8856"></td>
        <td id="LC8856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most of the characters that perform in this book still live, and are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8857"></td>
        <td id="LC8857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prosperous and happy. Some day it may seem worth while to take up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8858"></td>
        <td id="LC8858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story of the younger ones again and see what sort of men and women they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8859"></td>
        <td id="LC8859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned out to be; therefore it will be wisest not to reveal any of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8860"></td>
        <td id="LC8860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of their lives at present.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8861"></td>
        <td id="LC8861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8862"></td>
        <td id="LC8862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">End of the Project Gutenberg Ebook of Adventures of Tom Sawyer,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9075"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC9080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">written explanation. The person or entity that provided you with the</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9168"></td>
        <td id="LC9168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with these requirements. We do not solicit donations in locations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9169"></td>
        <td id="LC9169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where we have not received written confirmation of compliance. To SEND</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9170"></td>
        <td id="LC9170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any particular state</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9171"></td>
        <td id="LC9171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">visit http://pglaf.org</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9172"></td>
        <td id="LC9172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9173"></td>
        <td id="LC9173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9174"></td>
        <td id="LC9174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9175"></td>
        <td id="LC9175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9176"></td>
        <td id="LC9176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approach us with offers to donate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9177"></td>
        <td id="LC9177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9178"></td>
        <td id="LC9178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9179"></td>
        <td id="LC9179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from outside</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9180"></td>
        <td id="LC9180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the United States. U.S. laws alone swamp our small staff.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9181"></td>
        <td id="LC9181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9182"></td>
        <td id="LC9182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Please check the Project Gutenberg Web pages for current donation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9183"></td>
        <td id="LC9183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">methods and addresses. Donations are accepted in a number of other ways</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9184"></td>
        <td id="LC9184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">including including checks, online payments and credit card donations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9185"></td>
        <td id="LC9185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To donate, please visit: http://pglaf.org/donate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9186"></td>
        <td id="LC9186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9187"></td>
        <td id="LC9187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Section 5. General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9188"></td>
        <td id="LC9188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">works.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9189"></td>
        <td id="LC9189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9190"></td>
        <td id="LC9190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9191"></td>
        <td id="LC9191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9192"></td>
        <td id="LC9192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with anyone. For thirty years, he produced and distributed Project</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9193"></td>
        <td id="LC9193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9194"></td>
        <td id="LC9194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9195"></td>
        <td id="LC9195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9196"></td>
        <td id="LC9196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">editions, all of which are confirmed as Public Domain in the U.S. unless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9197"></td>
        <td id="LC9197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a copyright notice is included. Thus, we do not necessarily keep eBooks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9198"></td>
        <td id="LC9198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in compliance with any particular paper edition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9199"></td>
